Ara yadi manabajatike tadera eka dalera dbara an'ya dalake pratihata karara byabastha allah‌ra na thakato ta hale niscaya'i bidhabasta haye yeta girjagulo o mathaguli o upasanalaya o masajida samuha yekhane allah‌ra nama pracurabhabe smarana kara haya! Ara allah niscaya'i sahayya karena tamke ye tamke sahayya kare. Nihsandeha allah to mahabaliyana, mahasaktisali.
Era'i, -- amara yadi edera prthibite pratistha kari tahale era namaya kayema karabe o yakata adaya karabe o satkajera nirdesa debe o asat kaja theke nisedha karabe. Ara saba kajera parinama allah‌ra'i ekhatiyare.
Ara yadi tara tomake pratyakhyana kare tabe tadera age'o pratyakhyana karechila nuhera sampradaya o'adera o chamudera
ara ibrahimera sampradaya ebam lutera sampradaya
ara madiyanera basindara, ara musake'o pratyakhyana kara hayechila, tathapi ami abisbasidera abakasa diyechilama, takhana ami tadera pakara'o karalama, sutaram kemana hayechila amara sastidana
kajekaje'i kata ye janapada chila, -- amara seta dhbansa karechi yehetu ta atyacari chila, phale ta tara chadasaha bhenge-cure rayeche, ara kuyo parityakta hayeche ara sudrrha prasada
tara ki tabe duniyate bhramana kare ni yara phale tadera labha hayeche antahkarana ya diye tara hrdayangama karate pare athaba kana ya diye tara sunate pare? Bastutah cokha to adau andha naya, kintu andha hacecha hrdaya ya rayeche bukera bhetare.
Ara tara tomake sasti tbaranbita karate bale, athaca allah tamra oyadara kakhano khelapha karabena na. Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhura kache eka dina tomara ya ganana kara tara eka hajara bacharera samana.
Ara kata ye janabasati chila -- tara julumabaji sattbe'o ami take abakasa diyechilama, tarapara ami take pakara'o karalama, ara amara'i kache pratyabartana.
Balo -- ''ohe manabajati! Ami to tomadera jan'ya ekajana suspasta satarkakari matra.’’
Sejan'ya yara imana anabe o satkaja karabe tadera jan'ya rayeche paritrana o sam'manajanaka jibika.
Ara yara amadera nirdesabali biphala karara cesta kare tara'i hacche jbalanta agunera basinda.
Ara tomara age amara kono rasula patha'i ni ara kono nabi'o naya e bhinna ye yakhani tini akankha karechena takhana sayatana tamra akankha samparke kumantrana diyeche. Kintu allah batila kare dena sayatana yesaba kumantrana deya, takhana allah tamra nirdesabali pratisthita karena. Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani
yena sayatana ye kumantrana deya setike tini karate parena ekati pariksara bisaya tadera jan'ya yadera antare byadhi rayeche, ara yadera hrdaya hayeche kathina. Ara atyacarira to niscaya'i sudura prasari bicchinnataya rayeche
ara yena yadera jnana de'oya hayeche tara janate pare ye eti tomara prabhura kacha theke satya, kaje'i tara yena ete bisbasa sthapana kare ara tadera hrdaya yena tamra prati birnata hate pare. Ara nihsandeha allah to sahaja-sathika pathera dike paricalaka tadera jan'ya yara imana eneche.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara e sanbandhe sandeha kara theke birata habe na yataksana na gharighanta atarkite tadera upare ese pare, athaba tadera upare ese pare eka dhbansa‌tmaka dine sasti.
Ajakera dine sarbadhinayakatba hacche allah‌ra.’’ Tini tadera madhye bicara karabena. Sutaram yara imana eneche o satkaja karache tara'i thakabe anandamaya udyane.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare o amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare, tara'i tabe -- tadera jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
Ara yara allah‌ra pathe hijarata kare, tarapara nihata haya athaba mrtyu barana kare, allah abasya'i tadera uttama jibanopakarana upabhoga karate debena. Ara nihsandeha allah -- tini'i to jibikadatadera madhye sarbasrestha.
Tini niscaya'i tadera prabesa karabena emana ekati prabesasthale yate tara khusi habe. Ara nihsandeha allah to sarbajnata, ati amayika.
E'i rakame'i. Ara ye pratisodha laya yatata utpirana take kara hayechila tara samaparimane, tarapara tara prati atyacara kara haya, tahale allah niscaya'i take sahayya karabena. Nihsandeha allah to parama ksamasila, paritranakari.
Emana kare'i, kenana allah ratrike prabesa karana dinera madhye ara dinake dhukana ratera madhye, ara allah‌i to sarbasrota, sarbadrasta.
E dharane'i, kenana nihsandeha allah -- tini'i satya, ara tamke chere diye tara yake dake ta to mithya ara nihsandeha allah -- tini'i samucca, mahamahima.
Tumi ki dekha na ye allah akasa theke pathana pani, takhana prthibi sabuja rana dharana kare? Nihsandeha allah sadasaya purna oyakibahala.
Ya kichu ache mahakasamandalite o ya kichu ache prthibite se-samasta tamra'i. Ara nihsandeha allah‌, -- tini'i to sbayansamrd'dha, parama prasansita.
Tumi ki laksya kara na ye prthibite ya kichu ache allah ta tomadera adhina karechena, ara jahajagulo'o ya tamra nirdese samudre bicarana karache. Ara tini akasake thekiye rakhena tamra anumati byatireke prthibira upare para theke. Nihsandeha allah manusadera prati to parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera jibana dana karechena, tarapara tini tomadera mrtyu ghatabena, tarapara tini tomadera jibita karabena. Nihsandeha manusagulo bara akrtajna.
Pratyeka sampradayera jan'ya amara nirdharita kare diyechi niyama-kanuna ya tara palana kare, sutaram tara yena tomara sange e'i byapare bitarka na kare, ara tomara prabhura dike ahbana karo. Nihsandeha tumi'i to rayecha sahaja-sathika pathera upare.
Ara yadi tomara sange tara tarka-bitarka kare tabe bala -- ''allaha bhala janena ya tomara karacho.’’
Allah tomadera madhye kiyamatera dine bicara-mimansa kare debena ye-saba bisaye tomara matabheda karachile.
Tumi ki jana na ye mahakase o prthibite ya-kichu ache se-saba'i allah janena? Nihsandeha eti allahara jan'ye sahaja byapara.
Tara allahake chere diye yara upasana kare tara jan'ya tini kono dalila pathana ni ebam tadera kache se-bisaye kono jnana'o ne'i. Ara an'yayacaridera jan'ya kono sahayyakari ne'i.
Ara yakhana tadera kache amadera suspasta nirdesabali patha kara haya takhana yara abisbasa posana kare tadera ceharate tumi asbikrtira paricaya pabe. Tara caya yara amadera banisamuha tadera kache pare sunaya tadera upare laphiye parate. Tumi bala -- ''ami ki tabe tomadera sambada deba e-sabera ceye'o manda kichura?’’ Aguna. Allah eti oyada karechena tadeba jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare. Ara kata manda e gantabyasthala
ohe manabajati! Ekati upama chomra hacche, kaje'i ta sono. Nihsandeha allah‌ke chere diye tomara yadera dako tara kakhana'o ekati machi'o srsti karate pare na yadi'o sejan'ya tara saba'i ekatrita haya. Ara yadi machiti tadera kacha theke kichu niye yaya, tara ora kacha theke seti phiriye anate parabe na. Durbala se'i anbesanakari ara anbesita.
Tara allah‌ke mana-sam'mana kare na tamra yogya maryadaya. Nihsandeha allah to mahabaliyana, mahasaktisali.
Allah phirisatadera madhye theke banibahakadera manonita karena, ebam manusera madhye theke'o. Nihsandeha allah sarbasrota, sarbadrasta.
Tini abagata achena ya-kichu ache tadera samane ara ya-kichu ache tadera pechane, ara allah‌ra kache'i saba byapara phiriye ana haya.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara ruku karo o sijada karo, ara tomadera prabhura ebadata karo ebam bhalakaja karo yate tomara saphalakama hate paro.
Ara allah‌ra pathe jihada karo yebhabe tamra pathe jihada kara kartabya. Tini tomadera manonita karechena, tabe tini tomadera upare dharmera byapare kono kathin'ya aropa karena ni. Tomadera pitrpurusa ibrahimera dharmamata. Tini tomadera namakarana karechena'musalima’, -- era age'i ara ete'o, yena e'i rasula tomadera jan'ya ekajana saksi hate parena ebam tomara'o janaganera jan'ya saksi hate para. Ata'eba tomara namaya kayema karabe o yakata adaya karabe ebam allah‌ke sakta ka’re dhare thakabe. Tini'i tomadera abhibhabaka, sutaram kata uttama e'i abhibhabaka ebam kata uttama e'i sahayyakari

tabe nijedera dampati athaba tadera danahate yadera dhare rekheche tadera chara, kenana seksetre tara nindaniya nahe

tarapara amara take bana'i sukrakita eka nirapada abasthana sthale

tarapara nihsandeha tomara era pare to mrtyu barana karabe.
Tarapara tomadera abasya'i kiyamatera dine punarut'thita kara habe.
Ara amara niscaya'i tomadera upare srsti karechi satati patha, ara srsti sanbandhe amara kakhana'o udasina na'i.
Ara amara akasa theke barsana kari pani ekati parimapa mato, tarapara amara take matite sanraksita kari, ara nihsandeha amara ta sariye nite'o saksama.
Tarapara tara dbara amara tomadera jan'ya srsti kari khejurera o anurera baganasamuha. Tomadera jan'ya tate rayeche pracura phalaphasala, ara ta theke tomara kha'oya-da'oya karo.
Ara gacha ya janme sina'i pahare, ta utpadana kare tela o jeli aharakaridera jan'ya.
Ara nihsandeha gabadi-pasute tomadera jan'ya rayeche siksaniya bisaya. Amara tomadera pana karate di'i tadera petera madhye ya ache ta theke, ara tadera madhye tomadera jan'ya ache pracura upakarita, ara tadera theke tomara kha'o
ara tadera upare ebam jahaje tomadera bahana kara haya.
Ara amara abasya'i nuhake tamra sbajatika kache pathiyechilama, takhana tini balechilena, ''he amara sbajati! Tomara allah‌ra upasana karo, tini chara tomadera jan'ya an'ya kona upasya ne'i. Tomara ki tabu'o bhakti-srad'dha karabe na?’’
Takhana tamra sbajatira madhye yara abisbasa posana karechila tadera pradhanara balale -- ''se to tomadera mato ekajana manusa chara ara kichu naya, se tomadera upare pradhan'ya pratistha karate ca'iche. Bastutah allah yadi ca'itena tabe tini niscaya'i phiris‌tadera pathate paratena. Amara to purbabartikalera amadera pitrpurusadera madhye emanata suni ni.
Se to ekajana manusa matra yake bhute dhareche, kaje'i kichukala take sahya ka’re cala.’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Amake sahayya karo tara amara prati ya mithyaropa karache sejan'ya.’’
Kajekaje'i amara tamra kache pratyadesa pathalama e'i bale -- ''amadera cokhera samane ebam amadera pratyadesa motabeka jahajati tairi kara, tarapara amadera nirdesa yakhana asabe o pani uthale uthabe takhana tate uthiye na'o hareka rakamera joraya- joraya, duti ka’re, ara tomara paribara parijanake, -- tadera madhyera yara birud'dhe baktabya ghosita hayeche take byatita ara yara an'yayacarana kareche tadera sanbandhe tumi amara kache balabali karo na. Tara to nimajjita habe'i.
Ara yakhana tumi jahaje arohana karabe, tumi o yara tomara sathe rayeche tara takhana balo -- 'sakala prasansa allah‌ra yini amadera ud'dhara karechena atyacari jatira theke.’
Ara balo -- 'amara prabhu! Amake punyamaya abatarana karate da'o, kenana abataranakarakadera madhye tumi'i sarbasrestha’.’’
Nihsandeha ete to nidarsana rayeche, ara amara to srnkhalabad'dha karachilama.
Tarapara amara tadera pare pattana karechilama an'ya eka bansake.
Takhana amara tadera madhye pathiyechilama tadera'i madhye theke ekajana rasula e'i bale -- ''allah‌ra upasana karo, tini byatita tomadera jan'ya an'ya upasya ne'i. Tomara ki tabe bhakti-srad'dha karabe na?’’
Ara tamra sbajatira madhyera pradhanara yara abisbasa posana karechila o parakalera mulakatake asbikara karechila ebam e'i duniyara jibane amara yadera bhoga-sara diyechilama tara balale -- ''e to tomadera mato ekajana manusa chara ara kichu'i naya, tomara ya theke kha'o se'o ta theke'i khaya ebam tomara ya pana kara se'o ta theke'i pana kare.
Ara tomara yadi tomadera n'yaya ekajana manusera'i ajna-palana kara tahale to tomara se'i muhurte'i ksatigrasta habe.
Se ki tomadera prati‌sruti deya ye yakhana tomara mara yabe ebam tomara dhulomati o harapamjarate parinata habe takhana tomara bahirgata habe
bahudura! Tomadera ya oyada kara hacche ta bahudura.
Amadera e'i duniyara jibana chara kichu'i to ne'i, amara maraba ara amara bemce achi, ara amara to punarut'thita haba na.
Se ekajana manusa bai to naya ye allah sanbandhe mithya udbhabana kareche, ara amara to tara prati asthabana hate parachi na.’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Amake tumi sahayya karo yehetu tara amara prati mithyaropa karache.’’

tarapara amara tadera pare pattana karalama an'yan'ya bansadera.
Kono sampradaya'i tara nirdharita kala tbaranbita karate parabe na, ara ta bilanbita karate'o parabe na.

Yakhana'i kono sampradayera kache tara rasula esechilena, tamke tara pratyakhyana karechila, ta'i amara tadera ekadalake an'ya dalera pascad'dhabana kariyechilama, ara tadera baniyechilama kahini. Sejan'ya tara edera dujanake pratyakhyana karala, tara phale tara dhbansapraptadera antarbhukta ha’la.
Ara amara abasya'i musake grantha diyechilama yena tara satpatha abalanbana karate pare.

He priya rasulagana! Pabitra bastu theke tomara kha'oya-da'oya karo ara bhala kaja karo. Tomara ya karacha se sanbandhe ami niscaya'i sarbajnata.
Ara -- ''nihsandeha tomadera e'i sampradaya eka'i sampradaya, ara ami'i tomadera prabhu, ata'eba amake'i toma ra bhaktisrad'dha karo.’’
Kinta tara nijedera madhye tadera anusasana tukaro-tukaro ka’re kete phelala. Pratyeka dala'i tadera kache yesaba rayeche tate'i santasta.

Ara amara kono sattbake tara ksamatara atirikta kasta di'i na, ara amadera kache ache ekati grantha ya haka katha bale deya, ara tadera an'yaya kara haya na.
Kinta tadera hrdaya e byapare talagola pakano abasthaya rayeche, ara e chara'o tadera jan'ya rayeche an'yan'ya kirtikalapa ye- sabe tara karitakarma.
Ye paryanta na amara tadera madhyera samrd'dhisali lokadera sasti diye pakara'o kari takhana'i tara artanada ka’re othe.

ahankarera sathe, e byapare sararata abola-tabola galpagujaba karate karate.’’

Ara yadi satya tadera kamanara anusarana karata tabe mahakasa-mandali o prthibi ebam tadera madhye ya ache saba'i bisrnkhala haye parata. Paksantare amara tadera kache tadera smaraniya barta niye esechi, kinta tara tadera smaraka-grantha theke bimukha thake.
Athaba tumi ki tadera kacha theke kono pratidana ca'icha. Bastutah tomara prabhura pratidana'i sarbottama, ara riyeka-datadera madhye tini'i sarbasrestha.
Ara nihsandeha tumi to tadera ahbana karacha sahaja-sathika pathera dike.
Ara yara parakale bisbasa kare na tara nihsandeha patha theke to bipathagami.

Sesa paryanta yakhana amara tadera upare khule di'i kathina kathina sasti thaka daraja takhana tara hatasa haye pare.

Nihsandeha amara bandadera madhyera ekati dala chila yara balata, 'amara prabhu! Amara imana enechi, kaje'i amadera paritrana karo, yehetu tumi'i to karunamayadera madhye sarbasrestha!’
Kinta tomara tadera hasi-thattara patrarupe grahana karechile ye paryanta na e-saba tomadera bhuliye diyechila amake smarana kara, ara tomara tadera niye upahasa kare calecha.
Nihsandeha tara ya adhyabasaya karata sejan'ya ajakera dine ami tadera puraskara dana karachi, ara tara to nijera'i hacche saphalakama.’’
Tini balabena -- ''tomara prthibite bachara gunatite katakala abasthana karechile?’’
Tara balabe -- ''amara abasthana karechilama ekati dina ba dinera kichu ansa, apani na haya jijnasa karuna gananakaridera.’’
Tini balabena -- ''tomara matra alpakala'i abasthana karechile -- yadi tomara janate parate!’’
Tomara ki tabe mane karechile ye amara tomadera anarthaka srsti karechi, ebam amadera kache tomadera phiriye ana habe na?’’
Bastutah allah mahimannita, maharajadhiraja, cirantana satya, tini byatita an'ya upasya ne'i, sam'manita arasera adhipati tini.
Ara ye ke'u allah‌ra sange an'ya upasyake dake, -- yara jan'ya tara kache kono sanada ne'i, -- tara hisabapatra tabe niscaya'i tara prabhura kache rayeche. Nihsandeha abisbasidera saphalakama kara haya na.
Balo -- ''amara prabhu! Paritrana karo, ara daya karo, kenana tumi'i to karunamayadera madhye sarbasrestha.’’
Ekati surah -- amara eti abatarana karechi ebam etike abasya-palaniya karechi, ara ete amara abatarana karechi suspasta ayatasamuha yena tomara manonibesa karate para.
Byabhicarini o byabhicari -- tadera dujanera pratyekake ekasa’ betraghate cabuka mara, ara allah‌ra bidhana palane tadera prati anukampa yena tomadera pakara'o na kare, yadi tomara allah‌te o akheratera dine bisbasa kara, ara muminadera ekati dala yena tadera sasti dekhate paya.
Byabhicari sahabasa karate pare na byabhicarini athaba bahukhodabadini byatita, ara byabhicarini -- tara sange sahabasa karate pare na byabhicari athaba bahukhodabadi byatita. Ara eti muminadera jan'ya nisid'dha.
Ara yara sati- sadhbi narike apabada deya ebam carajana saksi pesa kare na, tadera asi betraghate cabuka mara, ara tadera theke kakhana'o saksya grahana karabe na, kenana tara nijera'i to simalanghanakari
tadera ksetre byatita yara era pare ta'oba kare o sodhare neya, kenana allah nihsandeha paritranakari, aphura nta phaladata.
Ara yara tadera stridera prati apabada deya ebam tadera jan'ya tadera nijedera chara an'ya saksi thake na, tahale tadera ekajana'i allah‌ra name carabara saksyadane saksisabuta khara karabe ye se niscaya'i satyabadidera madhyekara
ara pancamabare ye allah‌ra abhisapa tara upare paruka yadi se mithyabadidera ekajana haya.
Ara tara theke sasti rodha kara yabe yadi se allah‌ra name carabara saksyadane saksi deya ye se niscaya'i mithyabadidera madhyekara
ara pancamabare ye allah‌ra krodha tara upare paruka yadi se satyabadidera ekajana haya.
Ara allah‌ra anugraha o tamra karuna yadi tomadera upare na thakata, ara allah ye ta'oba kabulakari, paramajnani.
Yara kutsa ratana karechila tara to tomadera'i madhyekara ekati dala. Etike tomadera jan'ya anistakara mane karo na, baram eti tomadera jan'ya kalyanakara. Tadera pratyeka lokera jan'ya rayeche papera ya se arjana kareche, ara tadera madhyera ye e byapare pradhana bhumika niyechila tara jan'ya ra'iche kathora sasti.
Yakhana tomara eti sunechila takhana kena mumina purusara o mumina narira tadera nijedera bisaye satdharana mane ane ni, ara bale ni -- ''e eka d'aha mithya’’
kena tara era jan'ya carajana saksi ane ni? Kaje'i tara yehetu saksi anate pare ni ta'i tara'i to allah‌ra kache sbayam mithyabadi.
Ara allah‌ra anugraha o tamra karuna yadi tomadera upare na thakata e'i duniyate ebam parakale, tahale e'i byapare tomara ya ratacchile sejan'ya tomadera niscaya'i sparsa karata eka kathora sasti.
Bah! Tomara tomadera jiba diye eti grahana karechile, ara ye byapare tomadera kono jnana ne'i se'i niye tomadera mukhe mukhe tomara balabali karachile, ara tomara eke bhebechile eka tuccha byapara, athaca allah‌ra kache e chila gurutara bisaya.
Ara yakhana tomara eti sunechile takhana kena temara bala ni -- ''e amadera jan'ya ucita naya ye amara e bisaye balabali kari, tomara'i saba mahima, e to eka gurutara apabada’’
allah tomadera upadesa dicchena ye tomara era mato acarane kakhana'o phire yabe na, yadi tomara mumina ha'o.
Ara allah tomadera jan'ya nirdesasamuha suspasta kare diyechena. Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
Nihsandeha yara bhalabase ye yara imana eneche tadera madhye aslilata prasara karuka tadera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti e'i duniyate o akherate. Ara allah janena, ara tomara jana na.
Ara yadi allah‌ra anugraha o tamra karuna tomadera upare na thakata, ara allah to parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara sayatanera padanka anusarana karo na. Ara ye ke'u sayatanera padanka anusarana kare, se to tabe aslilata o manda kajera nirdesa deya. Ara yadi allah‌ra anugraha o tamra karuna tomadera upare na thakata tabe tomadera madhyera ekajana'o kadapi pabitra hate parata na. Kinta allah yake iccha karena take pabitra karena. Ara allah sarbasrota.
Ara tomadera madhye yara karunabhandarera o pracuryera adhikari tara nikata-a‌tmiyadera o misakinadera o allah‌ra pathe hijaratakaridera dana karara birud'dhe sapatha grahana na karuka, ara tara ksama karuka o upeksa karuka. Tomara ki bhalabasa na ye allah tomadera paritrana karabena? Allah bastutah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Nihsandeha yara sati-sadhbi, niriha, bisbasini narike apabada deya tadera ihaloke o paraloke abhisapa de'oya habe, ara tadera jan'ya ra'ibe kathora sasti
se'i dine yedina tadera jihba o tadera hata o tadera pa tadera birud'dhe saksya debe ya tara kare calechila se-sanbandhe
se'idina allah tadera prakrta prapya sampurna mitiye debena, ara tara janate parabe ye allah -- tini'i prakasya satya.
Duscaritra nari duscaritra purusera jan'ya, ara duscaritra purusa duscaritra narira jan'ya, ara saccaritra nari saccaritra purusera jan'ya, ara saccaritra purusa saccaritra narira jan'ye, -- tara ya bale era ta theke mukta. Tadera jan'ya rayeche paritrana o sam'manajanaka jibika.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Nijedera grha chara tomara grhe prabesa kara na yataksana na tomara anumati niyecha o tadera basindadera salama karecha. E'iti'i tomadera jan'ya sreya, yena tomara manoyoga dite para.
Kinta yadi tomara tate ka'uke na pa'o tabe tate prabesa kara na yataksana na tomadera anumati de'oya haya, ara yadi tomadera bala haya -- 'phire ya'o’, tabe phire yeyo, -- eti'i tomadera jan'ya uttama. Ara tomara ya kara se-bisaye allah sarbajnata.
Tomadera upare kono aparadha habe na yadi tomara emana ghare prabesa kara yekhane kono basinda ne'i, tomadera jan'ya sekhane prayojana rayeche. Ara allah janena ya tomara prakasa kara o ya tomara gopana rakha.
Tumi mumina purusadera balo ye tara tadera drsti abanata karuka ebam tadera angika kartabyabalira hephajata karuka. E tadera jan'ya pabitratara. Tara ya kare allah se-bisaye niscaya'i purna oyakiphahala.
Ara mumina naridera balo ye tara yena tadera drsti abanata rakhe, ara tadera angika kartabyabalira hephajata kare, ara tadera angasobha yena pradarsana na kare sudhu tara madhye ya prakasa haye thake ta bhinna, ara yena tara tadera mathara kapara diye tadera bukera uparata dheke rakhe, ara tara yena tadera sobha-saundarya pradarsana kare na sudhu tadera sbamidera athaba tadera pitadera athaba tadera sbasuradera athaba tadera putradera athaba tadera satputradera athaba tadera bha'idera athaba tadera bhratusputradera athaba tadera bhaganedera athaba tadera paricarikadera athaba tadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche, athaba purusa cakara-nakara yadera kama-lalasa ne'i, athaba chelepiledera yadera naridera gopana anga sanbandhe jnanabodha haya ni, emana lokadera bhinna, ara tadera pa diye yena tara aghata na kare yate tadera alankarera ya lukiye ache ta janano yaya. Ara he muminagana! Tomara sakale mile allah‌ra dike phero yena tomadera saphalata arjana haya.
Ara biye diye da'o tomadera madhyera abibahitadera, ara tomadera dasadera o tomadera dasidera madhyera saccaritradera. Yadi tara abhabagrasta haya tabe allah tamra karunabhandara theke tadera sampada dana karabena. Ara allah mahabadan'ya, sarbajnata.
Ara yara bibahera patrapatri khomje paya na tara yena sanyata haye cale yataksana na allah tamra karunabhandara theke tadera sampada dana karena. Ara tomadera danahate yadera dhare rekheche tadera madhyera yara nikhapara caya tadera tabe likhe da'o yadi tadera madhye kalyanakara kichu thaka sanbandhe janate para, ara tini tomadera ya diyechena allah‌ra se'i dhana theke tadera dana karo. Ara tomadera dasi-bamdidera besyabrttite badhya kara na parthiba jibanera nasbara bastu kamana ka’re yadi tara saccaritra thaka pachanda kare. Ara ye ke'u tadera badhya kare seksetre tadera prati jabaradastira pare allah niscaya'i ksamakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara amara niscaya'i itimadhye tomadera kache suspasta nirdesabali abatarana karechi, ara tomadera purbe yara gata hayeche tadera udaharana, ara dharmabhirudera jan'ya diyechi upadesa.
Allah hacchena mahakasamandali o prthibira aloka. Tamra alokera upama hacche yena ekati kulangi yate ache ekati pradipa. Pradipati rayeche ekati kacera cimanira bhetare. Cimaniti yena ekati ujjbala taraka, yeti jbalano hayeche pabitra jayatuna gacha theke, -- purbancaliya naya, pascatyera'o naya, tara telata yena prajjbalita yadi'o aguna take sparsa karate pare na. Alokera upare aloka! Allah tamra alokera dike yake icche karena patha dekhiye nena. Ara allah manusera jan'ya upamagulo chomrena. Ara allah saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.
Se'isaba ghare yake allah anumati diyechena unnita hate ebam tamra name se-sabe guna-kirtana hate, se-sabe tamra japatapa kara haya sakala o sandhyaya
Byaktibarga, -- byabasa-banijya o beca-kena tadera birata karate pare na allah‌ra nama-kirtana theke o namaya kayema kara o yakata adaya kara theke, tara bhaya kare se'i dinake yedina hrdaya o cokha andolita habe
yena allah tadera pratidana dite parena srestha-sundarabhabe ya tara kareche sejan'ya, ara tamra karunabhandara theke tadera bariye'o dite parena. Ara allah behisaba riyeka diye thakena yake tini icche karena.
Paksantare yara abisbasa posana kare tadera kriyakarma marubhumira maricikara n'yaya, pipasarta take pani bale mane kare ye paryanta na se tara kache ase se aitira kichu'i dekhate paya na, baram se allahake tara samane dekhate pabe, sutaram tini tara hisaba cukiye debena. Ara allah hisaba-nikase tatpara.
Athaba gabhira samudrera talara ghora andhakarera n'yaya, take dheke rakhe eka dhe'u, tara upare areka dhe'u, tara upare ache megha. Ghora andhakara -- yara ekati aparatira upare. Se yakhana tara hata baraya se ta yena dekhate'i paya na. Ara yake allah tara nimitte aloka dena ni tara jan'ya tabe kono aloka ne'i.
Tumi ki dekha na ye allah -- tamra'i japatapa kare yara'i ache mahakasamandalite o prthibite, ara pakha-mele-thaka pakhi? Pratyeke'i jene rekheche tara namaya o tara namajapa. Ara tara ya kare se-sanbandhe allah samyaka jnata.
Ara mahakasamandali o prthibira sarbabhauma kartrtba allah‌ra, ara allah‌ra prati'i hacche pratyabartanasthala.
Tumi ki dekhate paccha na ye allah meghamalake caliye niye yana, tarapara tini tadera parasparera madhye jara karena, tarapara tadera tini punjibhuta karena, takhana tumi dekhate pa'o tara bhetara theke berucche brsti? Ara tini akasa theke paharagulo hate pathana tate thaka silara rasi, ara ta diye tini aghata karena yake khusi, ebam ta phiriye rakhena yake iccha tara theke. Tara bidyutera jhalaka drstisakti praya niye'i neya.
Allah rata o dinake bibartana karena. Nihsandeha ete to siksaniya bisaya rayeche drstisampannadera jan'ya.
Ara allah saba jibantajagatake srsti karechena pani theke, sutaram tadera madhye rayeche ya tara petera upare cale, ara tadera madhye ache ya du'i paye hamte, ara tadera madhye rayeche ya carakhanaya cale. Allah srsti kare yana ya tini cana. Nihsandeha allah saba bisaye sarbasaktimana.
Amara niscaya'i suspasta nirdesabali abatarana karechi, ara allah sahaja-sathika pathera dike calita karena yake tini icche karena.
Phale tara bale -- ''amara allah‌ra prati o rasulera prati imana enechi, ara amara ajna palana kari.’’ Tarapara tadera ekadala era pare'o phire yaya. Ara e'i lokagulo mumina naya.
Ara yakhana tadera daka haya allaha o tamra rasulera prati yena tini tadera madhye ekata mimansa karate parena, takhana dekho, tadera madhyera ekadala ghure yaya.
Ara yadi n'yayaparayanata tadera sapakse haya tabe tara tamra kache ase ghara nu'iye.
Odera hrdaye ki byadhi ache, na tara sandeha posana kare, na tara asanka kare ye allah o tamra rasula tadera prati an'yaya acarana karabena? Bastutah tara sbayam an'yayacari.
Nihsandeha muminadera katha hacche -- yakhana tadera daka haya allah o tamra rasulera prati yena tini tadera madhye bicara karate parena, takhana tara bale -- ''amara suni o palana kari.’’ Ara tara nijera'i haya saphalakama.
Ara ye allah‌ra o tamra rasulera ajna palana kare, ara allah‌ke bhaya kare o tamke bhaktisrad'dha kare, tahale tara nijera'i bijeta habe.
Ara tara tadera sudrrha asthara sathe allah‌ra name kasama khaya ye yadi tumi tadera adesa karate tahale tara alabat beriye parata. Tumi balo, ''sapatha karo na, anugatya to jana'i ache! Tomara ya kara allah niscaya'i se-bisaye oyakiphahala.’’
Balo -- ''allah‌ra anugatya kara o rasulera'o ajnapalana kara.’’ Kinta yadi tomara phire ya'o, tahale nihsandeha tamra upare rayeche sudhu tamke ye bhara de'oya hayeche, ara tomadera upare rayeche tomadera ye bhara de'oya hayeche. Ara yadi tomara tamra ajnapalana kara tabe tomara satpatha pabe. Ara rasulera upare kono dayitba ne'i suspastabhabe paumchano chara.
Tomadera madhye yara imana eneche ebam satkarma karache allah tadera oyada karachena ye, tini niscaya'i tadera prthibite pratinidhitba dana karabena, yemana tini pratinidhitba dana karechilena tadera yara chila edera purbabarti, ara abasya'i tini tadera jan'ya supratisthita karabena tadera dharma ya tini tadera jan'ya manonita karechena, ara niscaya'i tadera bhaya-bhitira pare tadera jan'ye badale anabena nirapatta. Tara amara'i ebadata karabe, amara sange an'ya ka'uke sarika karabe na. Ara ye ke'u era pare akrtajnata dekhabe -- tahale tara nijera'i hacche sima-langhanakari.
Ara tomara namaya kayema kara o yakata adaya kara ara rasulera ajnapalana kara, yate tomadera prati anugraha kara haya.
Tumi mane karo na ye yara abisbasa posana kare tara prthibite eriye yete parabe, baranca tadera abasasthala hacche aguna. Ara alabat manda se'i gantabyasthana.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche ebam tomadera madhyera yara sabalagatbe paumchayani tara yena tomadera anumati neya tinati samaye, -- phajarera namayera age, ara yakhana tomara madhyahnera garame tomadera jamakapara chere da'o, ebam isara namayera pare. E'i tina hacche tomadera jan'ya gopaniyata abalanbanera samaya. E'isaba bada diye tomadera jan'ya kono dosa habe na ebam tadera jan'ya'o naya. Tomadera ka'uke aparera kache to ghoraghuri karate'i haya. E'ibhabe'i allah tomadera jan'ya banisamuha suspasta kare diyechena. Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
Ara tomadera madhyekara chelepilera yakhana sabalagatbe paumche yaya takhana tara'o yena anumati caya yemana anumati ca'ita tara yara edera age rayechila. E'ibhabe'i allah tomadera jan'ya tamra banisamuha suspasta kare diyechena. Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
Ara naridera madhyera prerhara yara biyera asa kare na, tadera jan'ye tabe aparadha habe na yadi tara tadera posaka khule rakhe sobha-saundarya pradarsana na ka’re. Ara yadi tara sanyata thake tabe tadera jan'ya besi bhala. Ara allah sarbasrata, sarbajnata.
Andhera upare kono dosa ne'i o khomrara upare'o naya, yadi tomara ahara kara tomadera bari theke, athaba tomadera pitadera barite, kimba tomadera mayedera barite, nayata tomadera bha'idera barite, na haya tomadera bonadera barite, kimba tomadera cacadera barite, athaba tomadera phuphudera barite, nayata tomadera mamadera barite, athaba tomadera khaladera barite, kimba se'isabe yara cabi tomadera dakhale rayeche, athaba tomadera bandhudera. Tomadera upare kono aparadha habe na yadi tomara ekasange ahara kara athaba aladabhabe. Sutaram yakhana tomara barighare prabesa kara takhana tomadera parasparake salama kara allah‌ra tarapha theke kalyanamaya pabitra sambhasane. E'ibhabe'i allah tomadera jan'ya banisamuha suspasta kare diyechena yena tomara bujhate para.
Tara'i kebala mumina yara allah‌te o tamra rasule imana ane, ara yakhana tara kono samastigata byapare tamra sange thake takhana tara cale yaya na yataksana na tara tamra theke anumati niyeche. Nihsandeha yara tomara anumati prarthana kare tara'i hacche ora yara allah‌te o tamra rasule imana eneche, sutaram tara yakhana tadera kono byaparera jan'ya tomara anumati prarthana kare takhana anumati da'o tadera madhyera yake tumi iccha kara, ara tadera jan'ya allah‌ra ksama prarthana kara. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Tomadera madhye rasulera ahbanake tomara tomadera madhyera eke an'ye ahbanera mato ganya karo na. Allah abasya'i tadera janena tomadera madhyera yara cupi cupi sare pare, sejan'ya yara tamra adesera birud'dhe yaya tara sabadhana hoka pache kono biparyaya tadera upare patita haya, athaba kono marmantada sasti tadera upare apatita haya.
Eti ki naya ye mahakasamandalite o prthibite ya-kichu ache ta niscaya'i allah‌ra? Tini abasya janena tomara ya-kichute rayecha. Ara yedina tadera tamra kache pherata ne'oya habe sedina tadera janiye de'oya habe ya tara karata. Ara allah saba- kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.
Mahamahima tini yini tamra dasera kache abatarana karechena e'i phurakkana yena tini bisbamanabera jan'ya ekajana satarkakari hate parena.
Tini'i -- mahakasamandali o prthibira sarbabhaumatba tamra'i, ara tini kono santana grahana karena ni, ara se'i samrajye tamra kono sarika'o ne'i, ara tini'i saba-kichu srsti karechena, tarapara take bisesa parimape parimita rupa diyechena.
Tabu'o tara tamke chere diye an'ya upasyadera grahana kareche yara kichu'i srsti kare na, baram tadera nijederake'i srsti kara hayeche, ara tara nijedera jan'ya anista karate samarthya rakhe na, ara upakara karate'o naya, ara tara mrtyu ghatate ksamata rakhe na, ara jibana dite'o naya, kimba punarut'thanera ksetre'o naya.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara bale -- ''e'iti to mithya bai naya ya se tairi kareche ebam an'yan'ya lokajana e te take sahayya kareche.’’ Sutaram tara anacara o mithyacara niye eseche.
Ara tara balale -- ''sekalera upakatha -- e-saba se likhiye niyeche, ara egulo tara kache abrtti kara haya sakale o sandhyaya.’’
Tumi balo -- ''eti abatarana karechena tini yini mahakasamandali o prthibira rahasya saba janena. Tini asya'i paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara tara bale -- ''e kemana dharanera rasula, se khabara khaya o hate-bajare calaphera kare? Tara kache kena ekajana phirisata pathano ha’la na, yate se tara sange satarkakari hate parato
Athaba tara kache dhanabhandara pathiye de'oya hato, athaba tara jan'ya ekati bagana thakata ya theke se kheto?’’ Ara an'yayacarira bale -- ''tomara to ekajana jadugrasta lokake'i anusarana karacha!’’
Dekha, tara kemanabhabe tomara prati upama prayoga kare! Sutaram tara bipathe geche, kaje'i tara pathera disa pacche na.
Mahamahima tini yini iccha karale tomara jan'ya era ceye'o srestha bastu tairi karate parena -- baganasamuha yadera nica diye baye cale jharanaraji, ara tomara jan'ya tairi karate parena prasada-samuha.
Tathapi tara gharighantake asbikara kare, ara ye ke'u gharighantake mithya bale tara jan'ya amara tairi rekhechi eka jbalanta aguna.
Yakhana eti dura jayaga theke tadera dekhate pabe takhana theke'i tara era trud'dha garjana o hunkara sunate pabe.
Ara yakhana tadera srnkhalita abasthaya era madhyera eka sankirna sthane niksepa kara habe takhana tara se'ikhane'i dhbansa ha'oya ahbana karabe.
Ajakera dine tomara ekabarera dhbansera jan'ya kamana karo na, baram bahubara dhbansa ha'oyara doya karate thaka!’’
Tumi balo -- ''e'iti ki bhala, na cirasthayisbargodyana ya oyada kara hayeche dharmanisthadera jan'ya?’’ Ta hacche tadera jan'ya puraskara o gantabyasthala.
Sekhane tadera jan'ya rayeche ya tara kamana kare, tara sthayibhabe abasthana karabe. E'iti tomara prabhura upare n'yasta oyada ya prarthita habara yogya.
Ara se'idina tadera tini ekatrita karabena ara allah‌ke bada diye yadera tara upasana karata tadera'o, takhana tini balalena -- ''e ki tomara! Tomara'i ki amara e'isaba bandadera bibhranta karechile, na ki tara sbayam patha chere bipathe giyechila?’’
Tara balabe -- ''tomara'i saba mahima! Eti amadera jan'ya samicina naya ye tomake bada diye amara an'yan'ya abhibhabakadera grahana karaba. Kintu tumi tadera o tadera pitrpurusadera bhogasambhara diyechile, pariname tara bhule giyechila sabadhana-bani, phale tara hayechila ekati binasta jati.’’
Sutaram tomara ya balacha se-sanbandhe tara to tomadera mithya sabyasta kareche, kaje'i tomara pratirodha karate parabe na, ara sahayya'o pabe na. Ara tomadera madhye ye ke'u an'yaya kareche take amara birata sasti asbadana karaba.’’
Ara tomara age amara emana kono rasula patha'i ni yamra nihsandeha khabara na kheyechena o hate-bajare calaphera na karechena. Ara amara tomadera ka'uke aparadera jan'ya pariksasbarupa damra kariyechi. Tomara ki adhyabasaya caliye yabe? Ara tomara prabhu sarbadrasta.
Ara yara amadera sathe molakatera kamana kare na tara bale -- ''kena amadera kache phiris‌tadera pathano haya na, athaba amadera prabhuke'i ba kena amara dekhate pa'i na?’’ Tara tadera nijedera sanbandhe niscaya'i bara'i karache, ara bara bara bereche.
Yedina tara phiris‌tadera dekhate pabe se'idina aparadhidera jan'ya kono khosakhabara thakabe na, ara tara balabe -- ''alanghaniya byabadhana hoka.’’
Ara tara kajakarmera ya kareche ta amara bibecana karaba, tarapara take biksipta dhulikana baniye deba.
Sbargodyanera basindara sedina pabe utkrsta basasthana o sundaratara bisramasthala.
Ara se'i dina akasa bidirna habe meghamalara sange, ara phirisatadera pathano habe pathanora mato.
Sarbabhaumatba se'idina satyi-satyi parama karunamayera. Ara abisbasidera jan'ya se'i dinati habe bara kathina
ara se'idina an'yayakari tara hata kamarabe e'i bale -- ''haya amara durbhoga! Ami yadi rasulera sange patha abalanbana karatama
Haya! Ki aphasosa! Ami yadi emana ekajanake bandhurupe grahana na karatama
amake to se bibhrantite niye'i geche smarakagrantha theke ta amara kache asara pare! Ara sayatana manusera jan'ya sada hatasakari.’’
Ara rasula balachena -- ''he amara prabhu! Nihsandeha amara sbajati e'i kura'anake parityajya bale dhare niyechila. ’’
Ara e'ibhabe'i amara pratyeka nabira jan'ya satru srsti karechi aparadhidera madhye theke. Ara tomara prabhu'i pathapradarsaka o sahayakarupe yathesta.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara bale -- ''tamra kache kura'anakhana samagrabhabe ekebare abatirna ha’la na kena?’’ E'ibhabe'i -- yena era dbara tomara hrdayake amara supratisthita karate pari, ara amara eke sajiyechi sajanora mato.
Ara tara tomara kache niye asate parabe na kono samasya, amara kintu tomara nikata niye asaba prakrta-satya o srestha- sundara byakhya.
Tadera mukha-thubare-para abasthaya yadera jahannamera dike ekatrita kara habe tara'i habe abasthara dika diye ati nikrsta ara pathera dika diye bara'i pathabhrasta.
Ara itipurbe amara musake dharmagrantha diyechilama, ara tamra sange tamra bha'i harunake sahayaka baniyechilama.
Kaje'i amara balechilama -- ''tomara dujane cale ya'o se'i lokadera kache yara amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana kareche.’’ Pariname amara tadera dhbansa karechilama purna bidhbanse.
Ara nuhera sbajati -- yakhana tara rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila takhana amara tadera dubiye diyechilama, ara lokadera jan'ya tadera eka nidarsana baniyechilama. Ara an'yayacaridera jan'ya amara eka marmantuda sasti tairi kare rekhechi.
Ara'ada o chamuda o rasa-era adhibasidera, ara tadera madhyekara bahusankhyaka bansake'o.
Ara pratyekera'i belaya -- amara tara jan'ya drstantagulo pradana karechilama. Ara sakalake'i amara bidhabasta karechilama purnabidhbanse.
Ara tara to se janapadera pasa diye'i yatayata kare yara upare amara barsana karechilama eka asubha brsti. Tara ki tabe eti dekhate paya ni? Na, tara punarut'thanera pratyasa kare na.
Ara tara yakhana tomake dekhe takhana tara tomake thatta-bidrapera patra chara an'yabhabe grahana kare na. ''E-i ki se yake allah rasula baniyechena
se to amadera deba-debidera theke amadera praya sariye'i niyechila yadi na amara tadera prati anuraga posana karatama!’’ Ara sighra'i tara janate parabe yakhana tara sasti pratyaksa karabe -- ke patha theke adhika pathabhrasta.
Tumi ki take dekhecha ye tara kamanake tara upasyarupe grahana kareche? Tumi ki tabe tara jan'ya ekajana karnadhara habe
athaba tumi ki mane kara ye tadera adhikansa'i sone athaba bojhe? Tara to garu-chagalera mato chara ara kichu naya, baram tara patha theke adhika pathabhrasta.
Tumi ki pratyaksa kara ni tomara prabhura prati -- kibhabe tini chaya bistara karena? Ara tini yadi ca'itena tabe eke anara kare ditena. Amara baram suryake era upare nirdesaka baniyechi.
Tarapara amara etike amadera kache tene ni'i aste aste tanate tanate.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera jan'ya ratrike karechena abarani, ara ghumake bisramasbarupa, ara dinake karechena jege othara jan'ya.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini batasake pathana susambadadata-rupe tamra karunara prakkale, ara amara akasa theke barsana kari bisud'dha pani
yena amara tara dbara mrta bhukhandake jibana dana karate pari, ebam ta pana karate di'i bahusankhyaka gabadi-pasuke o manusake yadera amara srsti karechi.
Ara amara niscaya'i etike bitarana kari tadera madhye yena tara smarana karate pare, kinta adhikansa loke'i pratyakhyana kara chara ara kichute ekamata haya na.
Ara yadi amara ca'itama tahale pratyekati janapade eka-ekajana satarkakari damra karatama.
Ata'eba abisbasidera ajnanusarana karo na, baram tumi era sahayye tadera sange jihada karo kathora jihade.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini duti sagarake prabahita karachena, -- ekati mista, pipasa damanakaraka, ara ekati labanakta, teto sbadabisista, ara e du'iyera madhye tini srsti karechena eka'barayakha’ o eka anatikramya byabadhana.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini manusake srsti karechena pani theke, tarapara tara jan'ya sthapana karechena rakta-samparka o baibahika samparka. Ara tomara prabhu atyanta ksamatasali.
Ara tara allah‌ke bada diye tara upasana kare ye tadera kono upakara karate pare na, ara tadera apakara'o karate pare na. Ara abisbasi rayeche tara prabhura birud'dhe prsthaposaka.
Ara amara tomake susambadadata o satarkakarirupe bhinna an'yabhabe patha'i ni.
Tumi bala -- ''ami tomadera kacha theke era jan'ya kono majuri ca'i na, sudhu e-i ye ye-ke'u iccha kare se yena tara prabhura abhimukhe patha dhare.’’
Ara tumi nirbhara kara ciribera upare yini mrtyu barana karena na, ara tamra prasansara sathe japatapa karo. Ara tamra bandadera papacara sanbandhe oyakiphahalarupe tini'i yathesta
yini srsti karechena mahakasamandali o prthibi ebam e du'iyera madhyera sabakichuke chaya dine, tarapara tini adhisthita halena arasera upare, -- tini parama karunamaya, ata'eba tamra sanbandhe jijnasa kara kono oyakiphahalake.
Ara yakhana tadera bala haya, 'parama karunamayake sijada kara’, tara bale -- ''karunamaya abara ke? Amara ki take'i sijada karaba yara sanbandhe tumi amadera adesa kara?’’ Ara eti tadera jan'ya bariye deya bitrsna.
Mahamahima tini yini mahakase tarakaraji srsti karechena, ara tate baniyechena eka pradipa o eka candra -- diptidayaka.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini rata o dinake baniyechena bibartanakrama tara jan'ya ye caya smarana karate, athaba ye caya krtajnata janate.
Ara parama karunamayera bandara hacche tara yara prthibite namrabhabe calaphera kare, ara yakhana ajna lokera tadera sanbodhana kare takhana bale -- ''salama’’.
Ara yara rata katiye deya tadera prabhura jan'ya sijadabanata haye o damriye theke.
Ara yara bale -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera theke jahannamera sasti phiriye rakha, era sasti to alabat apratihata
nihsandeha eti bisramasthala o basasthana bisabe kata nikrsta!’’
Ara yara yakhana kharacapatra kare takhana amitabyaya kare na, ara karpanya'o kare na, baram tara e duyera madhyasthale kayema rayeche.
Ara yara allah‌ra sange an'ya upasyake dake na, ara n'yayera prayojane byatita yara emana kono lokake hatya kare na yake allah nisedha karechena, ara yara byabhicara kare na. Ara ye e'i kare se papera sastira saksat pabe'i
ara kiyamatera dine tara jan'ya sasti bariye de'oya habe, ara sekhane se hina abasthaya sthayi haye ra'ibe
se byatita ye ta'oba kare ebam imana ane o punya-pabitra kriyakarma kare. Sutaram tara'i, -- allah tadera mandakajake satkaja diye badale debena. Ara allah satata paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara ye ke'u ta'oba kare ebam satkarma kare se-i to tabe allah‌ra prati pherara mato phere.
Ara yara mithya byapare saksya deya na, aba yakhana tara khelo paribesera pasa diye yaya takhana tara maryadara sathe pasa kete yaya.
Ara yara yakhana tadera prabhura nirdesasamuha tadera smarana kariye de'oya haya takhana tara tara upare jhampiye pare na badhira o andha haye.
Ara yara bale -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera stridera theke o amadera santana-santati theke cokha-jorano ananda amadera pradana karo, ara amadera tumi baniye da'o dharmaparayanadera netrsthaniya.’’
E'isaba lokedera pratidana de'oya habe ucum padamaryada diye yehetu tara adhyabasaya karechila, ara sekhane tadera abhyarthana kara habe abhibadana o salama janiye
sekhane tara sthayibhabe thakabe, -- bisramasthala o basasthana hisabe kata sundara
balo -- ''tomadera doya na thakale'o amara prabhura kichu yaya ase na, kintu tomara to pratyakhyana'i karecha, sejan'ya sighra'i anibarya sasti asache.’’
Tba, sina, mima.
Esaba hacche suspasta granthera banisamuha.
Tumi hayata tomara nijeke mere'i phelabe yehetu tara mumina hacche na.
Yadi amara iccha karatama tahale amara tadera upare akasa theke ekati nidarsana pathate paratama, takhana era karane tadera ghara nu'iye hetam kare deya hata.
Ara tadera nikata parama karunamayera kacha theke kono natuna smaraniya-barta asate na asate'i tara ta theke bimukha haye yaya.
Tahale tara pratyakhyana kare'i pheleche, sutaram ya niye tara thatta-bidrapa karata tara sambada tadera kache sighra'i asache.
Tara ki prthibira dike ceye dekhe na -- ete amara pratyeka utkrsta kalpataru kata ye janniyechi
nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya
ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara smarana karo! Tomara prabhu musake deke balalena -- ''tumi atyacari lokadera kache ya'o
phira'a'unera lokadera kache. Tara ki dharmabhiruta abalanbana karabe na?’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Ami abasya'i asanka kari ye tara amake pratyakhyana karabe.
Amara buka sankucita haye pareche, ara amara jihba bak‌patu naya, sejan'ya harunera prati'o daka patha'o.
Ara amara birud'dhe eka aparadha tadera tattbabadhane rayeche, sejan'ya ami bhaya kari ye tara amake katala karabe.’’
Tini balalena -- ''kakhano na! Ata'eba tomara dujane'i amadera nidarsana samuha niye ya'o, niscaya'i amara tomadera sange rayechi sunate thaka abasthaya.
Sutaram tomara phira'a'unera nikata ya'o ara balo -- 'amara alabat bisbajagatera prabhura rasula
ye isara'ilera bansadharadera amadera sange pathiye da'o’.’’
Se balale -- ''tomake ki chelebelaya amadera kache'i lalanapalana kari ni, ebam tumi ki amadera'i madhye tomara jibanera bahu batsara kata'o ni
ara tomara kaja ya tumi karecha ta to kare'icha, tathapi tumi akrtajnadera madhyekara!’’
Tini balalena -- ''ami eti karechilama yakhana ami pathabhrastadera madhye chilama.
Erapara yakhana ami tomadera bhaya karechilama takhana ami tomadera theke pherara halama, tarapara amara prabhu amake jnana dana karechena, ara tini amake baniyechena rasuladera an'yatama.
Ara e'i to hacche se'i anugraha ya tumi amara kache ullekha karacha yara jan'ye tumi isara'ilera bansadharadera dasa baniyecha!’’
Phira'a'una balale -- ''bisbajagatera prabhu abara ki haya?’’
Tini balalena -- ''mahakasamandali o prthibira ebam tadera madhye ya-kichu ache tara prabhu, -- yadi tomara drrhapratyayita ha'o.’’
Se tara asapase yara ache tadera balale -- ''tomara ki sunacha na?’’
Tini balalena -- ''tomadera prabhu ebam purbakalera tomadera pitrpurusadera'o prabhu.’’
Se balale -- ''tomadera rasulati yake tomadera kache pathano hayeche se to bad'dha pagala.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tini purba o pascimera ebam e du'iyera madhye ya ache tara'o prabhu, yadi tomara bujhate parate.’’
Se balale -- ''tumi yadi amake chara an'ya upasya grahana kara tabe ami alabat tomake kayedidera antarbhukta karaba.’’
Tini balalena -- ''ki! Ami tomara kache suspasta kichu anale'o?’’
Se balale -- ''tabe ta niye esa yadi tumi satyabadidera ekajana ha'o.’’
Sutaram tini tamra lathi niksepa karalena, takhana ascarya! Eti eka spasta sapa haye gela.
Ara tini tamra hata bera karelana, takhana dekho! Darsakadera kache ta sada haye gela.
Se tara asapasera pradhanadera balale -- ''e to niscaya'i eka ostada jadukara
se ca'iche tara jadura dbara tomadera desa theke tomadera bera kare dite, kaje'i ki tomara upadesa da'o?’’
Tara balale -- ''take o tara bha'ike abakasa da'o, ara sahare sahare sangrahakadera patha'o
yena tara pratyeka jnani jadukaradera tomara kache niye ache.’’
Sutaram jadukaradera ekatra kara ha’la nirdista sthane bijnapita dine
ara lokadera bala ha’la -- ''tomara ki jamayet haccha
yena amara jadukaradera anugamana karate pari yadi tara nijera bijayi haya?’’
Tarapara yakhana jadukarara ela tara phira'a'unake balale -- ''amadera jan'ya ki bisesa puraskara thakabe yadi amara khoda bijayi ha'i?’’
Se balale -- ''ham, ara seksetre tomara niscaya'i antaranga habe.’’
Musa tadera balalena -- ''choro ya tomara churamte yaccha.’’
Sutaram tadera daridara o tadera lathi-lagura tara churamlo ebam balale -- ''phira'a'unera prabhabe amara to nijera'i bijayi haba.’’
Tarapara musa tamra lathi niksepa karalena, takhana dekho! Eti gile phelala ya tara bunechila.
Takhana jadukarara lutiye parala sijadabanata haye
Tara balale, ''amara imana analama bisbajagatera prabhura prati
yini musa o harunera'o prabhu.’’
Se balale -- ''tomara tara prati bisbasa sthapana karale ami tomadera anumati debara age'i? Se-i niscaya tomadera guru ye tomadera jadubidya sikhiyeche. Sutaram sighra'i tomara tera pabe. Ami niscaya tomadera hata o tomadera pa ara'ari- bhabe kete phelaba'i, ara tomadera saba'ike sule caraba.’’
Tara balale -- ''kono ksati ne'i, nihsandeha amara amadera prabhura kache pratyabartanasila.
Amara niscaya'i asa kari ye amadera prabhu amadera aparadhasamuha ksama kare debena, yehetu amara muminadera madhye agrani.’’
Ara amara musake pratyadesa diyechilama e'i bale -- ''amara bandadera niye ratera madhye ra'oyana haye ya'o, tomadera abasya pascad'dhabana kara habe.’’
Takhana phira'a'una sahare-nagare sangrahakadera pathala
nihsandeha tara ekati chotakhata dala
ara nihsandeha amadera jan'ya tara to krodha udrekakari
ara amara to niscaya sajaga-sasastra janata.’’
Kaje'i amara tadera bera ka’re analama baganasamuha o jharanaraji theke
ara dhanabhandara o jamakalo barighara theke
e'ibhabe'i. Ara e'igulo amara isara'ilera bansadharadera uttaradhikara karate diyechilama.
Tarapara tara edera pascad'dhabana karechila suryodayakale.
Atahpara yakhana du'i dala parasparake dekhala takhana musara sangira balale -- ''amara to nihsandeha dhara pare gelama.’’
Tini balalena -- ''niscaya'i na, amara sange alabat amara prabhu rayechena, tini amake acire'i patha dekhabena.’’
Takhana amara musara nikata pratyadesa dilama e'i bale -- ''tomara lathi diye samudre aghata kara.’’ Phale eti bibhakta haye gela, sutaram pratyeka dala eka-ekati birata paharera mato hayechila.
Ara an'yaderake'o amara niye elama se'i ancale.
Ara musake o tamra sange yara chila se-saba'ike amara ud'dhara karechilama.
Tarapara an'yaderake amara dubiye diyechilama.
Nihsandeha ete to ekati nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara tumi tadera kache ibrahimera kahini barnana karo.
Smarana karo! Tini tamra pitrpurusake o tamra sbajatike balalena -- ''tomara kisera upasana kara?’’
Tara balale -- ''amara pratimadera puja kari, ara amara tadera aradhanaya nisthabana thakaba.’’
Tini balalena, ''tara ki tomadera sone yakhana tomara dako
athaba tara ki tomadera upakara karate pare kimba apakara karate pare?’’
Tara balale -- ''na, amadera pitrpurusadera amara dekhate peyechi e'ibhabe tara karache.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha tomara kisera upasana karacha
tomara o tomadera purbagami pitrpurusara
ata'eba tara alabat amara satru, kinta bhu-bisbera prabhu nana
yini amake srsti karechena, tarapara tini amake patha dekhiyechena
ara yini amake ahara karana ebam pana karate dena
ara yakhana ami roge bhogi takhana tini'i amake arogya karena
ara yini, amara mrtyu ghatabena tarapare amake punarjibana debena
ara yini, ami asa kari, bicarera dine amara bhulabhrantigulo amara jan'ya ksama kare debena.
Amara prabhu! Amake jnana dana karo, ara amake satkarmidera sange yukta karo.
Ara amara jan'ya parabartidera madhye sadalapana srsti karo.
Ara amake anandamaya udyanera oyarisanera antarbhukta karo.
Ara amara pitrpurusake paritrana karo, kenana se to pathabhrantadera madhyekara haye geche.
Ara amake lanchita karo na takhana ye'idina tadera purut'thita kara habe
yedina dhanasampade kono kaja debe na, santanadite'o naya
Sudhu se byatita ye nirmala-nispapa antara niye allah‌ra kache asabe.’’
Ara sbargodyanake dharmabhirudera jan'ya sannikate ana habe
ara duyakhake khole de'oya habe pathabhrastadera jan'ya.
Ara tadera bala habe -- ''kothaya tara yadera tomara upasana karate
allah‌ke bada diye? Tara ki tomadera sahayya karache, na tara nijedera'i sahayya karate parache?’’
Sutaram tadera era madhye niksepa kara habe -- tadera ebam pathabhrantadera
ara ibalisera dalabala sakalake'o.
Tara sekhane tarka-bitarka karate karate balabe
allah‌ra dibya, amara to spasta bibhrantite'i chilama
yakhana amara bisbajagatera prabhura sange tomadera eka-samana ganya karechilama.
Ara aparadhira chara an'ya ke'u amadera bipathe neya ni.
Sejan'ye amadera jan'ya suparisakaridera ke'u ne'i
ara kono antaranga bandhu'o ne'i.
Haya! Amadera jan'ya yadi akerabara upaya thakata tahale amara muminadera madhyekara hatama.’’
Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu, -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Nuhera sbajati rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila.
Dekho! Tadera bha'i nuha tadera balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmaparayanata abalanbana karabe na
ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ekajana bisbasta rasula
ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kara o amake mene cala.
Ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono parisramika ca'i na, amara majuri to bisbajagatera prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya.
Ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhakti-srad'dha kara o amara ajnapalana kara.’’
Tara balale -- ''amara ki tomara prati imana anaba yakhana tomake anusarana karache itaragosthi?’’
Tini balalena -- ''tara ki karata se sanbandhe ara amara jnana thakabara naya.
Tadera hisabapatra amara prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya, yadi tomara bujhate
ara ami to muminadera tariye debara patra na'i.
Ami ekajana spasta satarkakari bhinna na'i.’’
Tara balale -- ''he nuha! Tumi yadi na thamo tahale tomake abasya'i prastaraghate-nihatadera antarbhukta kara habe.’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Amara sbajati amake pratyakhyana kareche.
Ata'eba amara madhye o tadera madhye ekati sid'dhanta ene mimansa kare da'o, ara amake o amara sathe muminadera yara rayeche tadera ud'dhara kare da'o.’’
Sutaram amara tamke o tamra sathe yara chila tadera ud'dhara karalama bojha'i kara jahaje.
Tarapara amara dubiye dilama parabarti abasistadera.
Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu, -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara'ada jati rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila.
Dekho, tadera bha'i huda tadera balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmaparayanata abalanbana karabe na
ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ekajana bisbasta rasula
ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhaya kara o amake mene cala.
Ara ami e-jan'ya tomadera kache kono majuri ca'i na, amara najuri to bhu-bisbera prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya.
Tomara ki pratyeka pahare ayatha stambha nirmana karacha
ara durga tairi karacha yena tomara cirasthayi habe?’’
Ara yakhana tomara pakara'o kara takhana jabaradastabhabe pakara'o kare thaka.
Sutaram tomara allah‌ke bhaktisrad'dha kara o amara ajnapalana kara.
Ara bhaya-bhakti kara tamke yini tomadera madada karechena ya tomara sikhecha ta diye
ara tini tomadera sahayya karechena gabadi-pasu o santana-santati diye
ara baganasamuha o phoyaragulo diye.
Nihsandeha ami asanka karachi tomadera upare eka mahadinera sastira.’’
Tara balale -- ''tumi upadesa da'o athaba upadesadatadera madhye tumi na'i-ba ha'o amadera kache saba'i samana.
E to sekele acarana chara kichu'i naya
ara amara sasti pabara na'i.’’
Kaje'i tara tamke pratyakhyana karala, sutaram amara tadera dhbansa karechilama. Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu, -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara chamuda jati rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila.
Dekho, tadera bha'i salih tadera balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmabhiruta abalanbana karabe na
ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ekajana bisbasta rasula
ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kara o amake mene cala
ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono majuri ca'i na, amara majuri to bisbajagatera prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya.
Ekhane ya ache tate ki tomadera nirapade rekhe de'oya habe
baganasamuhe o phoyaraguloya
ara sasyaksetre o khejura-bagane yara charigulo bhari
tomara to pahara khude barighara tairi kara nipunabhabe.
Sutaram tomara allah‌ke bhakti-srad'dha kara o amara ajnapalana kara.
Ara simalanghanakaridera nirdesa mene cala na
yara dese asanti srsti kare ara santisthapana kare na.’’
Tara balale -- ''tumi to nihsandeha jadugrastadera'i ekajana.
Tumi amadera mato manusa chara ara kichu na'o, ata'eba kono eka nidarsana niye esa yadi tumi satyabadidera madhyekara ha'o.’’
Tini balalena -- ''e'i ekati usti, tara jan'ya paniya thakabe ara tomadera jan'ya'o paniya thakabe nirdharita samaye.
Ara tomara anista diye oke sparsa karo na, pache eka bhayankara dinera sasti tomadera pakara'o kare.’’
Kinta tara etike hatya karale, pariname sakala-sakala'i tara paritapakari hala.
Sejan'ya sasti tadera pakara'o karala. Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara lutera lokadala rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila.
Dekho! Tadera bha'i luta tadera balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmabhiruta abalanbana karabe na
ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ekajana bisbasta rasula
ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhayabhakti kara o amake mene cala.
Ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono majuri ca'i na, amara majuri to bisbajagatera prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya.
Tomara ki manusajatira madhye purusadera kache'i ese thaka
ara parityaga karacha tomadera stridera yadera tomadera prabhu tomadera jan'ya srsti karechena? Na, tomara to simalanghanakari jati.’’
Tara balale -- ''he luta! Tumi yadi birata na ha'o tahale tumi niscaya'i nirbasitadera antarbhukta habe.’’
Tini balalena -- ''ami abasya'i tomadera acaranake ghrnakaridera'i ekajana.
Amara prabhu! Tara ya kare ta theke amake o amara paribara parijanake ud'dhara karo.’’
Sutaram amara tamke o tamra paribarabargake eka'i sange ud'dhara karalama
eka burike chara, ye pechane-pare-thakadera madhye rayechila.
Tarapara amara an'yan'yadera bidhbansa karechilama.
Ara tadera upare amara barsana karechilama eka brsti, -- sutaram kata manda e'i brsti satakakrtadera jan'ya.
Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu, -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
A'ikara adhibasira rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila.
Dekho, so'a'iba tadera balechilena -- ''tomara ki dharmaparayanata abalanbana karabe na
ami niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ekajana bisbasta rasula
ata'eba tomara allah‌ke bhayabhakti kara o amake mene cala.
Ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono parisramika ca'i na, amara parisramika to bisbajagatera prabhura kache chara an'yatra naya.
Mape puromatraya debe, ara tomara mape-kama-kara lokadera antarbhukta hayo na.
Sathika pallaya ojana karo.
Ara lokajanera ksatisadhana karo na tadera bisayabastu sanbandhe, ara duniyate biparyaya ghatiyo na anistacarana ka’re.
Ara bhaya-bhakti karo tamke yini tomadera srsti karechena ebam purbabarti lokadera'o.’’
Tara balale -- ''tumi to alabat jadugrastadera madhyekara,’’
ara tumi amadera n'yaya ekajana manusa chara ara kichu'i na'o, ara amara tomake mithyabadidera ekajana bale'i to ganana kari.
Ata'eba akasera ekati tukaro amadera upare phele da'o, yadi tumi satyabadidera madhyekara ha'o.’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu bhala janena ki tomara kara.’’
Kinta tara tamke pratyakhyana karala, sejan'ye eka andhakara dinera sasti tadera pakara'o karala. Nihsandeha eti chila eka bhisana dine sasti.
Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu, -- tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara nihsandeha eti niscaya'i bisbajagatera prabhura tarapha theke eka abatarana.
Ruhula amina eti niye abatarana karechena
tomara hrdayera upare, yena tumi satarkakaridera an'yatama hate para
suspasta arabi bhasaya.
Ara nihsandeha eti purbabartidera dharmagranthe rayeche.
Eki tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana naya ye isara'ilera bansadharadera panditagana eti jane
ara amara yadi eti abatarana karatama kono bhinna desiyera kache
ara se eti tadera kache patha karata, tahale tara tate bisbasabhajana hato na.
E'ibhabe'i amara etike prabesa kariyechi aparadhidera antare.
Tara ete bisbasa karabe na ye paryanta na tara marmantuda sasti pratyaksa kare.
Sutaram e tadera kache asabe akasmikabhabe, ara tara tera pabe na.
Takhana tara balabe -- ''amara ki abakasa prapta haba?’’
Ki, tara ki ekhana'o amadera sasti sanbandhe taratari karate caya
tumi ki tabe laksya karecha -- yadi amara tadera bahu bachara bhoga-bilasa karate di'i.
Tarapara tadera kache ese pare ya tadera oyada kara hayechila
tabu ya tadera upabhoga karate de'oya hayechila ta tadera kono kaje asabe na
ara amara kono janapada dhbansa kari ni yara satarkakari chila na.
Smarakagrantha, ara amara kakhana'o an'yayakari na'i.
Ara sayatanara e niye abatarana kare ni
ara tadera pakse e samicina naya, ara tara samarthya'o rakhe na.
Nihsandeha sunabara ksetre tara to aparaga.
Sutaram tumi allah‌ra sathe an'ya upasyake deko na, pache tumi sastipraptadera madhyekara haye ya'o.
Ara tomara nikatatama a‌tmiyadera sabadhana kare da'o
ara tomara dana anata karo muminadera yara tomake anusarana kare tadera prati.
Kinta tara yadi tomara abadhyata kare tabe balo -- ''ami alabat dayamukta tomara ya kara se sanbandhe.’’
Ara tumi nirbhara kara mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladatara upare
yini tomake dekhena yakhana tumi damra'o
ebam sijadakaridera sange tomara utha-basa karate.
Nihsandeha tini -- tini'i sarbasrota, sarbajnata.
Ami ki tomadera janaba kadera upare sayatanara abatarana kare
tara abatarana kare pratyeka mithyabadi papacarira upare
tara kana pate, ara tadera adhikansa'i mithyabadi.
Ara kabigana, -- tadera anusarana kare bhrantapathagamira.
Tumi ki dekha na ye tara nihsandeha pratyeka upatyakaya laksyahinabhabe ghure beraya
ara tara niscaya'i ta'i bale ya tara kare na
Tabe tara byatita yara imana ane o satkaja kare, ebam allah‌ke khuba ka’re smarana kare, ara atyacarita habara pare pratiraksa kare. Ara yara an'yaya kare tara acire'i janate parabe kona biparyayera madhye tara pratyabartana karache.
Tba, sina. E-saba hacche kura'anera tatha suspasta granthera banisamuha
muminadera jan'ya patha-nirdesaka ebam susambadabahaka
yara namaya kayema kare o yakata pradana kare, ara tara akherata sanbandhe sbayam drrhabisbasa rakhe.
Nihsandeha yara parakale bisbasa kare na tadera kriyakarmake amara tadera jan'ya cittakaryaka karechi, phale tara andhabhabe ghure beraya.
Era'i tara yadera jan'ya rayeche eka kastakara sasti, ara parakale tara khoda habe sarbadhika ksatigrasta.
Ara abasya tumi, -- tomake'i to kura'ana pa'oyano hayeche parama jnani sarbajnatara tarapha theke.
Smarana karo! Musa tamra parijanake balalena -- ''nihsandeha ami agunera abhasa pacchi, ami ekhani sekhana theke tomadera kache kono khabara niye asachi, athaba tomadera jan'ya jbalanta anata niye asachi yate tomara nijedera garama karate para.’’
Atahpara yakhana tini era kache elena takhana a'oyaja halo e'i bale -- ''dhan'ya se'ijana ye agunera bhetare ebam ye era asepase rayeche. Ara sakala mahima bisbajagatera prabhu allah‌ra
he musa! Nihsandeha e'i to ami allah -- mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Ara tomara lathi chumre mara.’’ Tarapara yakhana tini etike dekhalena daurache -- yena eti ekati sapa, tini takhana pechana dike chutalena ara ghure dekhalena na. ''He musa, bhaya karo na, nihsandeha rasulagana amara samane bhaya kare na
se byatita ye an'yaya kareche tarapara manda kajera pare badala kare bhala kaja, tahale ami niscaya'i paritrana kari, aphuranta phaladata.
Ara tomara hata tomara pakete dhoka'o, eti beriye asabe sada haye kono dosatruti chara, -- phira'a'una o tara lokadalera kache nayati nidarsanera antargata. Nihsandeha tara hacche simalanghanakari jati.’’
Tarapara yakhana amadera nidarsanagulo tadera kache ela darsaniyabhabe, tara balale -- ''e to pariskara jadu.’’
Ara tara esaba pratyakhyana karala an'yayabhabe o ud'dhatabhabe, yadi'o tadera antara egulote nihsansaya chila. Ata'eba ceye dekho -- kemana hayechila biparyaya srstikaridera parinama.
Ara abasya'i itipurbe amara da'uda o sula'imanake jnana dana karechilama, ara tamra ubhaye balechilena -- ''samasta prasansa allah‌ra jan'ya yini amadera sresthatba diyechena tamra bahusankhyaka mumina bandadera upare.’’
Ara sula'imana da'udake uttaradhikara karalena ebam balalena -- ''ohe janagana, amadera paksi-bijnana sekhano hayeche, ara saba jinisa theke amadera de'oya hayeche. Nihsandeha eti -- e abasya'i suspasta anugrahasamagri.’’
Ara sula'imanera samane samabeta kara hayechila tamra bahinike -- jina o manusa o pakhidera theke, ara tadera kucaka'oyaja karano halo.
Tarapara yakhana tamra namaladera upatyakaya esechilena takhana ekajana namala balale -- ''ohe namalajati! Tomadera barighare dhoke ya'o, sula'imana o tamra bahini yena tomadera pise na phele yadiba tara bujhate na pare.’’
Sutaram tini tara kathaya bismita haye mucaki hasalena o balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Tumi amake anumati da'o yena tumi amara prati o amara pitamatara prati ye niyamata arpana karecha tomara se'i asisera jan'ya ami krtajnata janate pari, ara ami yena satkarma karate pari ya tumi pachanda kara, ara tomara anugraha basatah amake tomara satpathabalanbi bandadera antarbhukta karo.’’
Ara tini pakhidera paryabeksana karalena, takhana balalena -- ''eki! Hudahudake dekhachi na kena? Se ki garahajiradera ekajana
ami abasya'i take kathina sasti deba, athaba ami niscaya'i take jaba'i karaba, athaba take abasya'i amara kache asate habe suspasta ajuhata niye.’’
Tarapara tini anatibilanbakala apeksa karalena takhana se balale, ''ami tara khomja peyechi ye-sanbandhe apani abagata nana, ara ami saba’ theke apanara kache asachi sathika barta niye.
Ami niscaya'i eka narike dekhate pelama tadera upara rajatba karache, ara take saba-kichu theke de'oya hayeche, ara tara rayeche eka mastabara sinhasana.
Ara ami take o tara lokadera dekhate pelama tara allah‌ke bada diye suryake sijada karache, ara sayatana tadera jan'ya tadera kriyakalapa cittakarsaka kareche, kaje'i patha theke se tadera sariye rekheche, sutaram tara satpatha pacche na
ta'ito tara allah‌ke sijada kare na yini mahakasamandali o prthibira gupta bisayabastu prakasa kare dena, ara yini janena ya tomara lukiye rakha ebam ya prakasa kara.
Allah‌, tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i, yini mahana arasera adhipati.’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara sighra'i dekhaba tumi ki satya balacha, na tumi mithyabadidera madhyekara
amara e'i lipi niye ya'o ara eti tadera kache arpana kara, tarapara tadera theke cale esa, ara dekha ki tara pherata pathaya.’’
Se balale -- ''ohe pradhanagana! Nihsandeha amara kache eka sam'manita lipi pathano hayeche.
Eti alabat sula'imanera kache theke, ara eti pradhanatah e'i -- 'allah‌ra nama niye, yini rahamana, rahima
amara birud'dhe yena hamabara'i kara na, ara amara kache esa musalima haye’.’’
Se balale -- ''ohe pradhanagana! Amara karaniya sanbandhe amake upadesa da'o, ami kono byapare sid'dhanta grahanakari ha'i na ye paryanta na tomara amara saksate thako.’’
Tara balale -- ''amara saktira adhikari ebam prabala bikramera'o adhikari, ara hukuma apanara'i kache, ata'eba bhebe dekhuna ki apani hukuma karabena.’’
Se balale -- ''nihsandeha raja-badasara yakhana kono janapade prabesa kare takhana take biparyasta kare deya ebam tara basindadera srestha maryadasampannadera baniye deya carama lanchita, ara e'ibhabe'i tara kare thake.
Ara ami abasya tadera kache pathate yacchi ekati upahara, tarapara dekhate ca'i dutara ki niye phere.’’
Tarapara yakhana sula'imanera kache se ela takhana tini balalena -- ''ki! Tomara ki amake mala-asababa diye madada karate ca'o? Kinta allah amake ya diyechena ta tomadera tini ya diyechena tara ca'ite srestha. Na, tomadera upahara sanbandhe tomara'i garbabodha karacha.
Tadera kache phire ya'o, amara abasya'i tadera kache asaba sain'yabahini niye yara mokabila karara ksamata tadera ne'i, ara amara abasya'i sekhana theke tadera bahiskara karaba lanchanara sathe, ara tara banabe chotaloka.’’
Tini balalena -- ''ohe pradhanagana! Tomadera madhye ke amara kache niye asabe tara sinhasana amara kache musalimarupe tadera asabara purbe?’’
Jinadera eka joyana balale -- ''ami eti apanara kache niye asaba apanara asana chere othabara age'i, ara ami abasya'i e byapare bisesa ksamatabana, bisbasta.’’
Yara kache dharmagranthera jnana rayeche emana ekajana balale -- ''ami eti apanara kache niye asaba apanara drsti apanara kache phire asara age'i.’’ Tarapara yakhana tini eti dekhate pelena tamra parsbe sthapita hayeche takhana balalena -- ''e amara prabhura karunabhandara theke, yate tini amake pariksa ka’re dekhate parena ami krtajnata jnapana kari, na akrtajnata posana kari. Ara ye ke'u krtajnata prakasa kare se abasya'i krtajnata janaya tara nijera jan'ya, ara ye ke'u akrtajnata posana kare -- amara prabhu niscaya'i mahabittabana, mahanubhaba.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tara sinhasanakhana tarajan'ya badale da'o, amara dekhate ca'i se satpatha abalanbana kare, na se tadera dalera haya yara satpathe cale na.’’
Tarapara yakhana se ela takhana bala ha’la -- ''tomara sinhasana ki e'i rakamera?’’ Se balale, ''eti'i yena ta'i.’’''Ara amadera jnana de'oya hayeche tara age, ara amara musalima chilama.’’
Ara allah‌ke bada diye se yara puja karata ta'i take nibrtta karechila, nihsandeha se chila abisbasi lokadera madhyekara.
Take bala ha’la -- ''darabara-ghare prabesa karo.’’ Kinta yakhana se ta dekhala se etike mane karala eka bisala jalasaya, ara se tara kapara tene tulalo. Tini balalena -- ''eti'i darabara ghara, masrna kara hayeche kaca diye.’’ Se balale -- ''amara prabhu! Ami nihsandeha amara a‌tmara prati an'yaya karechi, ara ami sula'imanera sange bisbajagatera prabhu allah‌ra prati atnasamarpana karachi.’’
Ara amara abasya'i chamuda jatira kache tadera bha'i salih‌ke pathiyechilama e'i bale -- ''tomara allah‌ra ebadata kara.’’ Kintu dekho! Tara du'i dala haye gela -- paraspare bibada karate lagala.
Tini balalena -- ''he amara sbajati, tomara kena mandake tbaranbita karate ca'icha bhalara age? Kena tomara allahara paritrana khomjo na yate tomadera karuna kara haya?’’
Tara balale -- ''tomake o tomara sange yara ache tadera amara amangalamaya mane kari.’’ Tini balalena -- tomadera amangala-kamana allah‌ra ekhatiyare, bastutah tomara haccha eka gosthi yadera pariksa kara hacche.’’
Ara se sahare chila nayajana loka yara dese gandagola srsti karata, ara tara santi sthapana karata na.
Tara balale -- ''allah‌ra name tomara kasama kha'o ye amara abasya'i take o tara parijanabargake ratrikale akramana karaba, tarapara tara dabidarake amara alabat balaba -- 'amara tara parijanabargera hatyakanda dekhate pa'i ni, ara amara to nihsandeha satyabadi.’’
Ara tara eka sarayantrera cakranta karechila, ara amara'o eka parikalpana udbhabana karechilama, kinta tara bujhate'o pare ni.
Ata'eba ceye dekho, tadera sarayantrera parinama ki hayechila, -- nihsandeha amara tadera ebam tadera sbajatike sakalye dhbansa karechilama.
Sutaram e'i to tadera gharabarisaba -- bhenecure rayeche yehetu tara an'yayacarana karechila. Nihsandeha ete to eka nidarsana rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara jane.
Ara amara ud'dhara karechilama tadera yara imana enechila o bhayabhakti kare calata.
Ara luta, smarana kara! Tini tamra jatike balechilena -- ''tomara ki aslilata karate'i thakabe, athaca tomara dekhate paccha
tomara ki naridera bada diye kamatrptira jan'ya puruse'i upagata habe? Na, tomara ekati sampradaya yara murkhami karacha.’’
Kinta tamra lokadera jababa ara kichu chila na e'i bhinna ye tara balale -- ''tomadera janapada theke lutera parijanabargake bera kare da'o, era to emana loka yara pabitra sajate caya!’’
Amara takhana tamke o tamra parijanabargake ud'dhara karechilama tamra stri byatita, amara take dharya karechilama pechane raye ya'oyadera antarbhukta.
Ara tadera upare amara barsana karechilama eka brsti, ata'eba bara manda chila satarkikrtadera barsana
balo -- ''samasta prasansa allah‌ra, ara santi tamra bandadera upare yadera tini manonita karechena. Allah srestha, na yadera tara sarika kareche
accha! Ke mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena, ara tomadera jan'ya akasa theke pani barsana karena? Tarapara amara ta diye utpanna kari sobhamaya baganasamuha, -- tomadera pakse eti sambhabapara naya ye tomara egulora gachapala bariye tulabe. Allah‌ra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Tabu'o tara satya tyaga kare emana eka jati.
Accha! Ke prthibitake abasasthala karechena, ara era phamka-ciraguloke baniyechena nadinala, ara era jan'ya damra kariyechena pahara-parbata, ara duti samudrera madhyakhane tairi karechena eka byabadhana? Allah‌ra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Tabu'o tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Accha! Ke sara dena bipadagrastera prati yakhana se tamke dake ara bipada-apada dura kare dena, ara tomadera baniyechena prthibite pratinidhi? Allah‌ra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Alpa'i ya tomara manonibesa kara.
Accha! Ke tomadera patha dekhiye dena sthaladesera o samudrera andhakare, ara ke pathiye thakena bayuprabaha tamra karuna-bijarita susambadadatarupe? Allah‌ra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Tara ye-saba ansi damra karaya ta theke allah bahu urdhbe
accha! Ke srstira sucana karena tarapara tara punarabartana ghatana, ara ke tomadera akasa o prthibi theke riyeka dana karena? Allah‌ra sange ki an'ya upasya ache? Balo -- ''niye esa tomadera dalila-dastabeja yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Balo -- ''mahakasamandalira o prthibira ke'u'i gayeba sanbandhe jane na allah chara.’’ Ara tara jane na kakhana tadera punarut'thita kara habe.
Bastutah tadera jnana paraloke simita haye geche, baram tara e bisaye sandehe rayeche, bastutah e sanbandhe tara andha.
Ara yara abisbasa kare tara bale -- ''yakhana amara dhulo-mati haye yaba ebam amadera pitrpurusara'o, -- amara ki takhana thikathika'i bahirgata haba
abasya'i itipurbe eti amadera oyada kara hayechila -- amadera ara agerakale amadera pitrpurusadera'o, nihsandeha eti sekalera upakatha bai to naya!’’
Balo -- ''prthibite paribhramana karo, tarapara dekho kemana hayechila aparadhidera parinama!’’
Ara tadera karane tumi duhkha karo na, ara tara ya sarayantra karache sejan'ya tumi manahksunna hayo na.
Ara tara bale -- ''kakhana e'i oyada habe, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o?’’
Tumi balo -- ''hate pare tomara yara jan'ya taratari karacha tara katakata tomadera nikate'i ese geche.’’
Ara tomara prabhu niscaya'i to manusera prati karunasindhura malika, kinta tathapi tadera adhikansa'i krtajnata janaya na.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu abasya'i janena tadera buka ya lukiye rakhe ara ya tara prakasa kare.
Ara mahakase o prthibite kono gupta bisaya ne'i ya suspasta granthe naya.
Nihsandeha e'i kura'ana isara'ilera bansadharadera kache ye-saba bisaye tara matabheda kare tara adhikansa'i bibrta kare diyeche.
Ara eti alabat muminadera jan'ya eka pathanirdesa o karuna.
Nihsandeha tomara prabhu tamra hukuma motabeka tadera madhye mimansa kare debena, ara tini'i mahasaktisali, sarbajnata.
Sutaram tumi allah‌ra upare nirbhara kara. Nihsandeha tumi'i haccha suspasta satyera upare.
Tumi niscaya'i mrtake sonate parabe na ara badhirake'o ahbana sonate parabe na, yakhana tara phire yaya pichu hate.
Ara andhadera tadera pathabhrastata theke tumi patha-pradarsaka hate parabe na. Tumi to sonate para sudhu take ye amadera banisamuha bisbasa kare, phale tara musalima haya.
Ara yakhana tadera upare uktiti bartabe takhana tadera jan'ya amara bera ka’re anaba matira kita yeti tadera sange bakyalapa karabe, kenana manusagulo amadera nirdesabalite drrha bisbasa posana kare ni.
Ara se'idina -- pratyeka sampradaya theke amara eka ekati phaujake samabeta karaba yara amadera nirdesasamuha pratyakhyana karata, tarapara tadera srenibad'dha kara habe.
Tarapara yakhana tara ese pechambe takhana tini balabena -- ''tomara ki amara nirdesasamuha pratyakhyana karechile yakhana tomara jnane tara dharana karate para ni? Athaba ki ta ya tomara kare calechile?’’
Ara tadera upare uktiti bartabe yehetu tara an'yayacarana karechila. Takhana tara badanubada karate parabe na.
Tara ki dekhe na ye amara abasya'i ratake srsti karechi yena tara ete bisrama kare, ara dinake drsyamana? Niscaya ete to eka nidarsana rayeche se'i jatira jan'ya yara bisbasa kare.
Ara yedina sinaya phutkara de'oya habe takhana ye ke'u ache mahakasamandale o ye ke'u ache prthibite tara bhitigrasta habe se byatita yake allah iccha karena. Ara saba'i tamra kache asabe binata abasthaya.
Ara tumi paharaguloke dekhacha, tadera bhabacha acala-anara, kinta tara cale yabe meghamalara cale yabara n'yaya. E allahara'i hatera kaja yini saba kichu'i sunipunabhabe karechena. Tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe nihsandeha tini purna-oyakiphahala.
Ye ke'u ekati satkaja niye ase, tara jan'ya tabe thakabe era ceye'o bhala, ara tara se'i dinera bhiti theke nirapada thakabe.
Ara ye ke'u ekati manda kaja niye ase, tadera tabe tadera mukhera upare niksepa kara habe agunera madhye. ''Tomara ya kare calechile ta chara an'ya kichu ki tomadera pratidana de'oya hacche?’’
Amake abasya adesa kara hayeche ye ami upasana karaba e'i saharera prabhuke yetike tini pabitra karechena, ara tamra'i hacche saba-kichu. Ara amake adesa kara hayeche ye ami musalimadera'i ekajana haba
ara yena ami kura'ana patha karate pari.’’ Sutaram ye ke'u satpatha anusarana kare, se tabe nihsandeha satpathe cale tara nijera'i jan'ye, ara ye ke'u bipathe yaya tabe balo -- ''ami to kebala satarkakaridera'i ekajana.’’
Ara balo -- ''sakala prasansa allah‌ra, tini sighra'i tomadera dekhabena tamra nidarsanasamuha, takhana tomara se-saba cinate parabe.’’ Ara tomara prabhu amanoyogi nana tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe.
Tba, sina, mima.
Esaba hacche suspasta granthera banisamuha.
Amara tomara kache musa o phira'a'unera kahini theke yathayathabhabe bibrta karachi se'i lokadera jan'ya yara bisbasa kare.
Nihsandeha phira'a'una dese khuba ud'dhata hayechila, ara era basindadera se dalabibhakta karechila, se tadera ekadalake durbala baniyechila, -- se tadera betacheledera hatya karata o bamcate dita tadera meyecheledera. Nihsandeha se chila biparyaya srstikaridera an'yatama.
Ara amara ceyechilama yadera prthibite durbala banano hayechila tadera prati anugraha karate. Ara tadera neta karate ara tadera uttaradhikari karate
ara dese tadera pratistha karate, ara phira'a'una o hamana o tadera senabahinike amara ta dekhate ya tara tadera theke asanka karata.
Ara amara musara matara kache anuprerana dilama e'i bale -- ''etike stan'yadana karo, tarapara yakhana tara sanbandhe asanka kara takhana take panite phele da'o, ara bhaya karo na o duhkha'o karo na. Nihsandeha amara take phiriye deba tomara kache, ara take baniye tulaba rasulaganera ekajana ka’re.’’
Tarapara tamke tole nila phira'a'unera parijanabarga yena tini tadera jan'ya hate parena ekajana satru o duhkha. Nihsandeha phira'a'una o hamana o tadera sain'yasamanta chila dosi.
Ara phira'a'unera stri balala -- ''e amara jan'ya o tomara jan'ya eka cokha-jorano ananda! Eke katala karo na, hate pare se amadera upakare asabe, athaba take amara putrarupe grahana karaba.’’ Ara tara bujhate parala na.’’
Ara paraksane'i musara mayera hrdaya mukta ha’la. Se hayata eti prakasa kare'i phelata yadi na amara tara hrdaye bala ditama, yena se muminadera madhyekara haya.
Ara se tamra bonake balala -- ''era pechane pechane ya'o.’’ Kaje'i se tamra prati laksya rekhechila dura theke, ara tara bujhate pare ni.
Ara amara age theke'i stan'yapana tamra jan'ya nisid'dha karechilama. Takhana se balale, ''ami ki apanadera emana kono gharera lokera bisaye bale deba yara apanadera jan'ya take lalana-palana karate'o pare, ara tara era subhakankhi habe?’’
Takhana amara tamke phiriye dilama tamra mayera kache, yena tara cokha juriye yaya ara yena se duhkha na kare, ara yena se janate pare ye allah‌ra oyada dhrubasatya. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Ara yakhana tini tamra yaubane paumchalena o purnabayaska halena, amara takhana tamke jnana o bidya dana karalama. Ara e'ibhabe'i amara satkarmidera pratidana di'i.
Ara tini sahare prabesa karalena ye samaye era adhibasira asatarka chila, takhana tini sekhane dekhate pelena dujana loka maramari karache, -- ekajana tamra dalera ara ekajana tamra satrupaksera, takhana ye byakti tamra daliya se tamra sahayyera jan'ya citkara karala tara birud'dhe ye tamra satrupaksiya, sutaram musa take ghusi maralena, takhana tini take khatama kare phelalena. Tini balalena -- ''e'iti sayatanera kajera phale. Nihsandeha se eka satru -- prakasyabhabe bibhrantakari.’’
