Amara na haya kichukalera jan'ya sasti sthagita'i rakhaba, kinta tomara to phire yabe.
Yedina amara pakarabo birata dharapakare, sedina amara niscaya'i sesa-parinati dekhaba.
Ara tadera age amara to phira'a'unera lokadalake pariksa kare'ichilama, ara tadera nikata eka sam'manita rasula esechilena
e'i bale -- ''allah‌ra bandadera amara nikata pherata da'o, nihsandeha ami tomadera prati ekajana bisbasta banibahaka
ara yena tomara allah‌ra upare uthate ye'o na, nihsandeha ami tomadera kache niye esechi eka suspasta dalila.
Ara ami alabat asraya ca'ichi amara prabhu o tomadera prabhura kache, pache tomara amake pathara me’re mere phela.
Ara yadi tomara amate bisbasa na kara tahale amake yete da'o.’’
Tarapara tini tamra prabhuke deke balalena -- ''era hacche eka aparadhi jati.’’
Tahale amara bandadera niye ratrikale ra'oyana ha'o, tomara abasya'i pascad'dhabita habe
ara samudrake pechane rekhe ya'o santa abasthaya. Nihsandeha tara hacche emana eka bahini yara nimajjita habe.’’
Tara pechane phele eseche kata ye bagana o jharana
ara kheta-khamara o manorama basasthana
ara bhogasamagri yate tara abasthana karata.
E'ibhabe'i, ara e'isaba amara an'ya eka jatike uttaradhikara karate diyechilama.
Tarapara mahakasa o prthibi tadera jan'ya kamde ni, ara tara abakasaprapta'o hayani.
Ara amara niscaya'i isara'ilera bansadharadera ud'dhara kare diyechilama lanchana-dayaka sasti theke
phira'a'unera theke. Nihsandeha se chila maha'ud'dhata, simalanghanakaridera antarbhukta.
Ara amara abasya jene-sune'i tadera nirbacana karechilama lokajanera upare
ara tadera diyechilama kataka nidarsanabali yara madhye chila eka suspasta pariksa.
Nihsandeha era to bale'i thake
E'iti amadera prathamabarera mrtyu bai to naya, kaje'i amara to ara punarut'thita habo na.
Tahale amadera pitrpurusadera niye esa, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Era'i ki bhala, na tubbara lokera, ebam yara edera purbabarti chila? Amara tadera dhbansa karechilama, karana tara chila aparadhi.
Ara amara mahakasamandali o prthibi ara e du'iyera madhye ya-kichu ache ta chele-khelara jan'ya srsti kari ni.
Amara edutike satyera jan'ya bhinna srsti kari ni, kinta tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Nihsandeha phayasalara dina hacche tadera sabara nirdharita dinakala
yedina eka bandhu areka bandhura theke kono prakare labhabana habe na, ara tadera sahayya'o kara habe na
tara byatita yadera prati allah karuna karechena. Nihsandeha tini, tini'i to mahasaktisali, aphuranta phaladata.
Nihsandeha yikkuma brksa
papidera khadya
galita pitalera mato, -- petera bhetare
phutanta panira tagabaga karara mato.
Take pakaro, tarapara take tene niye ya'o bhayankara agunera majhakhane
tarapara tara mathara upare dhele da'o phutanta panira sasti
asbada kara, tumi to chile mahasaktisali, parama sam'manita!’
Alabat e hacche se'i ye-sanbandhe tomara sandeha karate.’’
Abasya dharmabhirura thakabe nirapada sthane
baganera o jharanara madhye
tara paridhana karabe mihi resama o puru jaridara posaka, parasparera mukhomukhi haye.
E'ibhabe'i! Amara tadera jora miliye deba ayatalocana huradera sathe.
Sekhane tara anate balabe bibidha phalaphasala, nirapattara sathe.
Tara sekhane mrtyu asbadana karabe na prathamabarera mrtyu byatita; ara tini tadera raksa karabena bhayankara agunera sasti theke
tomara prabhura kacha theke e eka karuna. Eti khoda eka birata saphalya.
Sutaram amara niscaya etike tomara bhasaya sahaja kare diyechi yena tara manonibesa karate pare.
Sutaram tumi pratiksa kara, nihsandeha tara'o apeksamana rayeche.
Ha mima
e granthera abatarana allah‌ra kacha theke, yini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Nihsandeha mahakasamandalite o prthibite to nidarsanabali rayeche muminadera jan'ya.
Ara tomadera srstira madhye ebam jibajantura madhye ya tini chariye diyechena tate nidarsanabali rayeche suniscita lokedera jan'ya
ara rata o dinera bibartane, ara allah akasa theke jibanopakaranera madhyera ya-kichu pathana o yara dbara prthibike sanjibita karena tara mrtyura pare, ara bayu prabahera paribartane nidarsanabali rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara jnana-bud'dhi rakhe.
E'isaba hacche allah‌ra nirdesabali ya amara tomara kache abrtti karachi yathayathabhabe, sutaram allah o tamra nirdesabalira pare kona dharmopadese tara bisbasa karabe
dhik pratyeka mithyabadi papisthera prati.
Ye allah‌ra banisamuha tara kache pathita hate sone, tarapara se ahankarera madhye atala thake yena se se-saba sone'i ni. Sejan'ya take susambada da'o marmantuda sastira.
Ara yakhana se amadera banigulo theke kono kichu janate pare se se-sabake tamasa ba’le grahana kare. Era'i -- edera'i jan'ya rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
Tadera samanera dike rayeche jahannama, ara tara ya arjana kareche ta taderake konobhabe'i labhabana karabe na, allah‌ke bada diye yadera tara abhibhabakarupe grahana karechila tara'o na, ara tadera jan'ya rayeche kathora sasti.
E'i hacche pathanirdesa, ara yara tadera prabhura banisamuha pratyakhyana kare tadera jan'ya rayeche kalusatara daruna marmantuda sasti.
Allah‌i tini yini samudrake tomadera adhina kare diyechena yate tamra bidhana anuyayi jahajagulo tate calate pare, ara yena tomara tamra karunabhandara theke anusandhana karate para, ara tomara yena krtajnata prakasa karate para.
Ara tini tomadera adhina kare diyechena mahakasamandalite ya-kichu ache ara ya-kichu rayeche prthibite, -- e samasta tamra kacha theke. Nihsandeha ete to nidarsanabali rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara cinta kare.
Yara bisbasa kare tadera tumi balo ye tara ksama karuka tadera yara allah‌ra dinagulora pratyasa kare na, e'i jan'ya ye tini lokadera yena pratidana dite parena ya tara arjana karachila sejan'ya.
Ye ke'u satkarma kare ta tabe tara nijera jan'ye, ara ye manda kare ta tabe tara'i birud'dhe, tarapara tomadera prabhura taraphe'i tomadera phiriye ana habe.
Ara amara abasya isara'ilera bansadharadera diye'ichilama grantha o jnana-bijnana o payaganbaratba, ara amara tadera jibika diyechilama uttama jinisa theke, ara tadera sresthatba diyechilama janaganera upare.
Ara amara tadera diyechilama bisayati sanbandhe suspasta pramanabali, kinta tadera kache jnana asara pare'o tara matabheda kare ni nijedera madhye irsa bidbesa byatita. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu tadera madhye kiyamatera dine bicara-mimansa kare debena ye bisaye tara matabheda karata se-sanbandhe.
Erapara amara tomake byaparatite eka sambidhanera upare pratisthita karechi, kaje'i tumi ta anusarana karo, ara tumi tadera kheyala-khusira anusarana kara na yara jane na.
Nihsandeha tara allah‌ra kacha theke kono kichute'i tomake adau labhabana karabe na. Ara alabat an'yayacarira -- tadera ke'u-ke'u apara karora bandhu, ara allah hacchena dharmabhiru-dera bandhaba.
E'i hacche manabajatira jan'ya drstidayaka, ara pathapradarsaka o karuna se'i lokadera jan'ya yara suniscita.
Yara duskarma kareche tara ki bhabe ye amara tadera baniye deba tadera mato yara imana eneche o satkarma karache -- tadera jibana o tadera marana ki eka samana? Kata nikrsta ya tara sid'dhanta kare
ara allah mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena satyera sathe, ara yate pratyeka sattbake pratiphala de'oya haya se ya arjana kareche ta'i diye, ara tadera prati an'yaya kara habe na.
Tumi ki tabe take laksya karecha ye tara kheyala-khusike tara upasyarupe grahana kareche? Ara allah jene-sune'i take pathabhrasta hate diyechena, ara tini mohara mere diyechena tara srabanendriye o tara hrdaye, ara tara darsanendriyera upare tini baniye diyechena ekati parda. Kaje'i allah‌ra pare ara ke take patha dekhabe? Tabu'o ki tomara manoyoga debe na
ara tara bale -- ''amadera duniyara jibana chara e'iti ara kichu'i naya, amara mari ara amara bemce thaki, ara kichu'i amadera dhbansa kare na samaya byatita.’’ Ara e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i. Tara anumana karache bai to naya.
Ara yakhana tadera kache amadera suspasta banisamuha patha kara haya takhana tadera bitarka ara kichu naya e bhinna ye tara bale, ''amadera purbapurusadera niye esa yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Tumi balo -- ''allah‌i tomadera jibana dana karena, tarapara tomadera mrtyu ghatana, tarapara tini tomadera ekatrita karabena kiyamatera dine -- tate kono sandeha ne'i, kinta adhikansa loke'i jane na.’’
Ara allah‌ra'i hacche mahakasamandali o prthibira sarbabhaumatba. Ara yedina gharighanta damriye yabe, se'idina batila- akhyadanakarira ksatigrasta habe.
Ara tumi dekhate pabe pratyeka sampradaya natajanu hate, pratyeka sampradayake daka habe tara kitabera prati. ''Ajakera dine tomadera pratidana de'oya hacche tomara ya karate ta'i diye.
E'iti amadera kitaba ya tomadera birud'dhe yathayathabhabe barnana kare. Nihsandeha amara lipibad'dha kare yacchi ya tomara kare calecha.’’
Sutaram yara imana eneche o satkarma karache tadera prabhu tadera prabesa karabena tamra karunaya. E'iti'i hacche prakasya saphalya.
Paksantare yara abisbasa posana kare -- ''emanata ki naya ye amara banisamuha tomadera kache pathita hayeche? Kinta tomara garbabodha karachile, ara tomara chile eka aparadhi sampradaya.
Ara yakhana bala haya -- 'nihsandeha allah‌ra oyada satya, ara gharighanta -- ete kono sandeha ne'i’, tomara takhana bale thaka -- 'amara jani na ki se'i ghari, amara bibecana kari kalpanika bai to naya, ara amara ade suniscita na'i’.’’
Ara tara ya karechila tara duskarmagulo tadera nikata prakasa haye parabe, ara ya niye tara thatta-bidrupa karata ta tadera paribestana karabe.
Ara bala habe -- ''aja amara tomadera bhule thakaba yemana tomara tomadera e'i dinatira saksat pa'oyake bhule thakate, phalata tomadera asrayasthala hacche aguna, ara tomadera jan'ya sahayyakaridera ke'u thakabe na.
E'iti'i! Kenana tomara allah‌ra banisamuhake tamasa bale ganya karechile, phalasbarupe e'i duniyara jibana tomadera pratarita karechila.’’ Sejan'ya ajakera dinataya sekhana theke tadera bera kara habe na, ara tadera prati sadayata'o dekhano habe na.
Ata'eba allah‌ra'i jan'ya samasta prasansa, tini mahakasamandalira prabhu o prthibira'o prabhu, -- samasta bisbajagatera prabhu.
Ara tamra'i hacche samasta gauraba-garima mahakasamandalite o prthibite, ara tini hacchena mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Ha mima
E granthera abatarana allah‌ra kacha theke, yini mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Amara mahakasamandali o prthibi ebam e du'iyera madhye ya-kichu rayeche ta satyera sathe ebam ekati nirdista kalera jan'ya chara srsti kari ni. Kintu yara abisbasa posana kare tara phire damraya ta theke ye-sanbandhe tadera satarka kara haya.
Tumi balo -- ''allah‌ke bada diye yadera tomara daka tadera katha ki tomara bhebe dekhecha? Prthibira kona jinisa tara srsti kareche amake dekha'o to? Athaba tadera ki kono ansa ache mahakasamandalite? Amara kache era agera kono grantha athaba jnanera kono pramanya ciha niye esa, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
Ara ke besi bipathe geche tadera ca'ite yara allah‌ke bada diye take dake ye tadera prati sara deya na kiyamatera dina paryanta, ara tara edera ahbana sanbandhe'i bekheyala thake
ara yakhana manabagosthike samabeta kara habe takhana tara tadera satru haye damrabe, ara tadera ye upasana kara hayechila se kathate'i tara asbikarakari habe.
Ara yakhana amadera suspasta banisamuha tadera kache pathita haya takhana yara abisbasa kare tara satya sanbandhe bale, yakhana ta tadera kache ase -- ''eto spasta jadu.’’
Athaba tara bale -- ''se eti jala kareche.’’ Tumi balo -- ''ami yadi eti jala kare thaki tahale tomara to allah‌ra tarapha theke kichu'i amara jan'ya ayatta kara na. Tini bhala janena tomara e bisaye ya balabali kara. Tini'i e byapare amara madhye o tomadera madhye saksi hisebe yathesta. Ara tini paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.’’
Tumi balo -- ''ami rasulaganera madhye prarambhika na'i, ara ami dharana karate pari na amara prati ki kara habe ebam tomadera samparke'o naya. Ami sudhu anusarana kari amara kache ya pratyadista hayeche ta bai to naya, ara ami ekajana suspasta satarkakari byatita ara kichu'i na'i.’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''tomara ki bhebe dekhecha -- eti yadi allah‌ra kacha theke haye thake ara tomara ete abisbasa kara, athaca isara'ilera bansadharadera theke ekajana saksyadata tamra anurupa sanbandhe saksya dena, phale tini bisbasa karena, kintu tomara garbabodha kara? Nihsandeha allah an'yayacari jatike satpathe calana na.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara tadera sanbandhe bale yara imana eneche, ''eti yadi bhala hato tahale tara era prati amadera patha sekhata na.’’ Ara yehetu tara era dbara satpathera disa paya ni ta'i tara to balabe'i, ''eti eka purano mithya.’’
Ara era age chila musara grantha -- agraduta o karunasbarupa. Ara ekhana hacche satyasamarthanakari kitaba, arabi bhasaya, yena eti satarka karate pare tadera yara an'yayacarana karache, ebam satkarmasiladera jan'ya hate pare susambada sbarupa.
Nihsandeha yara bale -- ''amadera prabhu hacchena allah‌’’, tarapara kayema thake, tadera upara tabe kono bhaya ne'i, ara tara nijera anutapa'o karabe na.
Era'i hacche behesatera basinda, tate'i tara sthayibhabe thakabe, -- tara ya kare calata sejan'ya eka pratidana.
Ara amara manusake tara matapitara samparke bhala byabaharera nirdesa diyechi. Tara mata kasta kare take garbhe dharana karechilena ara kasta kare take janma diyechilena. Ara take garbhe dharana karate o tara lalana-palane legechila trisati masa. Tarapara se yakhana tara yaubane paumche ebam callisa bachare paumche yaya takhana se bale -- ''amara prabhu! Tumi amake jagarita karo yena ami krtajnata janate pari tomara se'i anugrahera jan'ya ya tumi arpana karecha amara upare o amara matapitara upare, ara yena ami satkarma karate pari ya tomake khusi kare, ara amara prati kalyana karo amara santanasantatidera samparke. Ami abasya'i tomara dike phirechi, ara ami niscaya musalimadera madhyekara.’’
Era'i tara yadera theke amara grahana kare thaki tara ya karechila tara srestha ebam upeksa kari tadera manda karyabali -- jannatera basindadera antarbhukta. Pramanika prati‌sruti ya tadera kache oyada kara hata.
Ara ye tara matapitake bale -- ''dhuttora tomadera jan'ya! Tomara ki amake bhaya dekhaccha ye amake bera kara habe, athaca amara age bahu manababansa gata haye'i geche? Ara tara dujane allah‌ra sahayya kamana karabe -- ''dhik tomara jan'ya! Imana ano, allah‌ra oyada abasya'i satya.’’ Kintu se bale -- ''eto atitakalera upakatha chara ara kichu'i naya.’’
Era'i tara yadera upare ukti satya pratipanna hayeche -- jina o manusera madhyera se'isaba sampradayadera ksetre yara tadera age gata haye geche. Nihsandeha tara'i to ksatigrasta.
Ara pratyekera'i jan'ya rayeche tara ya kaja kareche tara theke bahu stara, ara yena tadera kriyakalapera jan'ya tini tadera pratiphala dite parena, ara tadera adau an'yaya kara habe na.
Ara se'i dina yara abisbasa posana karechila tadera samagata kara habe agunera nikate, ''tomara to tomadera bhala jinisasaba tomadera duniyara jibane'i yete diyechile, ara tomara sekhane bhogabilasa'i ceyechile, sutaram aja tomadera pratidana de'oya habe eka lanchanakara sasti, yehetu tomara duniyate yathartha karana byatita baramanasi karate, ara yehetu tomara simalanghana karate.’’
Ara tumi smarana kara'ada-dera bha'ike. Dekho! Tini tamra sbajatike satarka karechilena balura pahara ancale, ara satarkakarira to tamra age o tamra pare gata haye'i chilena, e'i bale -- ''allah chara an'yera upasana karo na, ami nihsandeha tomadera upare eka bhayankara dinera sastira asanka karachi.’’
Tara balale -- ''tumi ki amadera kache esecha amadera debadebira theke amadera phiriye rakhate? Tahale amadera kache niye esa to ya diye tumi amadera bhaya dekhaccha, -- yadi tumi satyabadidera antarbhukta haye thaka.’’
Tini balechilena -- ''jnana to allah‌ra'i kache rayeche, ara ami tomadera kache paumche dicchi ya diye amake pathano hayeche, kintu ami tomadera dekhate pacchi murkhami karacha emana eka lokadala.’’
Atahpara yakhana tara ta dekhate pela -- eka ghana-megha tadera upatyakagulora nikatabarti hacche, takhana tara balale -- ''e eka ghana kalo megha ya amadera jan'ya brsti barsana karabe.’’ Na, e hacche ya tomara tbaranbita karate ceyechila, -- e eka jhara-jha yate rayeche marmantuda sasti.’’
E tara prabhura nirdese saba-kichu'i dhbansa kare diyechila, phale acire'i tadera gharabari chara ara kichu dekha yacchila na. E'ibhabe'i amara pratidana di'i aparadhi lokadera.
Ara amara to tadera yemana pratistha kare diyechilama temanabhabe tomadera amara pratisthita kari ni, ara amara tadera diyechilama srabanendriya o darsanendriya o antahkarana. Kintu tadera srabanendriya tadera konobhabe'i labhabana kare ni, ara tadera darsanendriya'o na ara tadera antahkarana'o naya, yehetu tara allah‌ra banisamuha niye baje bitarka karata, kaje'i ya niye tara thatta- bidrapa karata ta'i tadera paribestana karechila.
Ara amara niscaya dhbansa kare diyechilama janapadaguloke yara tomadera asapase chila, ara amara nirdesabali barabara bibrta karechi yate tara phire ase.
Tahale allah‌ke bada diye yadera tara upasyarupe grahana karechila sannidhya labhera jan'ya tara kena tadera sahayya karala na? Bastutah tara tadera theke antardhana karala, ara eti'i chila tadera mithya ebam ya tara udbhabana karata.
Ara smarana karo! Amara tomara kache jinadera ekadalake jhumkiye diyechilama yara kura'ana sunechila, tarapara tara yakhana era samane hajira hala, tara balale -- ''cupa karo.’’ Tarapara yakhana ta sesa kara hala, tara tadera sbajatira kache phire gela satarkakarirupe.
Tara balale -- ''he amara sbajati! Nihsandeha amara emana eka grantha sunechi ya musara pare abatirna hayeche, samarthana karache era age yeti rayeche, ara paricalana karache satyera dike o sahaja-sathika panthara dike.
He amadera sbajati! Sara da'o allah‌ra dike ahabayakera prati, ara tamra prati imana ano, tini tomadera aparadhagulo theke tomadera paritrana karabena, ara tomadera raksa karabena marmantuda sasti theke.’’
Ara ye allah‌ra ahabayakera prati sara deya na, se tabe prthibite kichute'i eriye yabara patra naya, ara tamke bada diye tara jan'ya kono bandhubandhaba'o thakabe na. Era'i suspasta bibhrantite rayeche.
Tara ki satyi'i laksya kare ni ye allah‌i tini yini mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena, ebam yini e-sabera srstite kono klanti bodha karena ni, tini'i to mrtake jibita karate'o saksama? Hyam, tini niscaya'i saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
Ara yara abisbasa kareche tadera se'idina agunera nikate upasthita kara habe. ''E'iti ki carama-satya naya?’’ Tara balabe -- ''ham, amadera prabhura kasama?’’ Tini balabena -- ''tahale sastita asbadana kara, yehetu tomara abisbasa posana karate.’’
Ata'eba tumi dhairyadharana karo yemana dhairyadharana karechilena rasulaganera madhye yamra chilena drrha-pratijna, ara tadera jan'ya tarahuro karo na. Tadera ya oyada kara hayechila ta yedina tara dekhabe sedina tara yena dinamanera eka gharira besi abasthana kare ni. Yathesta paumchano hayeche! Sutaram simalanghanakari lokadala byatita ara kake'i ba bidhbansa kara habe
yara abisbasa posana kare ebam allah‌ra patha theke phiriye rakhe, tini tadera kriyakalapa byartha kare debena.
Ara yara imana eneche o satkarma karache, ara bisbasa karache tate ya muham'madera kache abatirna hayeche -- ara seti'i hacche tadera prabhura kacha theke agata mahasatya -- tini tadera manda karyabali tadera theke dura kare debena, ara bhala kare debena tadera abastha.
E'iti'i, kenana nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare tara mithyara anusarana kare, ara yehetu yara imana eneche tara tadera prabhura kacha theke asa satyera anugamana kare. E'ibhabe allah lokedera jan'ya tadera drstantagulo sthapana karena.
Sejan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare tadera sathe yakhana tomara mokabila kara takhana gardana mara, parisese yakhana tomara tadera parajita karabe takhana majabuta kare bamdhabe, takhana erapare haya sadayabhabe muktidana, na haya muktipana grahana -- yataksana na yud'dha tara astrabhara namiye deya, emanata'i. Ara allah yadi ca'itena tahale tini'i tadera theke pratisodha grahana karate paratena, kinta e'ijan'ya ye tomadera karoke yena aparera dbara tini suniyantrita karate parena. Ara yadera allah‌ra pathe sahida kara haya tadera kriyakarmake tini kakhano laksyahara hate debena na.
Tini tadera pathapradarsana karabena ebam tadera abastha bhalo karabena.
Ara tadera prabesa karabena sbargodyanasamuhe, tini tadera kache eti paricaya kariye diyechena.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Yadi tomara allahake sahayya kara tabe tini'o tomadera sahayya karabena, ara tini tomadera padaksepa sudrrha karabena.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tadera jan'ya durbhoga rayeche, ara tadera kriya-kalapake tini byartha kare debena.
Emanata'i, kenana allah ya abatarana karechena tara ta bitrsnara sathe pratyakhyana kare, kaje'i tini tadera kriyakalapa nisphala kare diyechena.
Tara ki tabe prthibite paribhramana kare ni? Tahale tara dekhate peta kemana hayechila tadera parinama yara edera age chila. Allah tadera ghayela karechilena, ara abisbasidera jan'ya rayeche era anurupa.
Emanata'i, kenana yara imana eneche tadera abhibhabaka niscaya'i allah‌, ara abisbasidera ksetre to -- tadera jan'ya kono murabbi ne'i.
Nihsandeha yara imana eneche o satkaje karache allah tadera prabesa karabena sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye calache jharanaraji. Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara bhoga-bilasa kare o khayadaya yemana jantu janoyarara kheye thake, ara aguna'i tadera abasasthala.
Ara janapadagulora katata ye -- ya chila aro besi saktisali tomara janabasatira ca'ite yeti tomake bahiskara kareche -- amara tadera dhbansa kare diyechilama, ara tadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari chila na.
Ye tara prabhura kacha theke eka spasta pramanera upare rayeche se ki tabe tara mato yara kache tara manda karyakalapake cittakarsaka kara hayeche? Phale tara nijedera kamana-basanara'i anusarana kare.
Dharmabhirudera jan'ya ye jannatera oyada kara hayeche tara upama hacche -- tate rayeche jharanaraji emana panira ya paribartita haya na, ara dudhera nadisamuha yara sbada badalaya na, ara surara srota ya panakaridera jan'ya susbadu, ara chamka madhura nadigulo. Ara tadera jan'ya se-sabe rayeche saba rakamera phalaphasala, ara tadera prabhura kacha theke rayeche paritrana. Tara mato ye agunera madhye abasthanakari, athaba yadera pana karano habe phutanta pani, phale tadera naribhumri ta chire phelabe
ara tadera madhye kichu loka ache yara tomara katha sone, tarapara tara yakhana tomara kacha theke beriye yaya takhana yadera jnana de'oya hayeche tadera bale, ''se e'imatra ki balale!’’ Era'i tara yadera hrdayera upare allah mohara mere diyechena, ara tara nijedera kheyalakhusira'i anusarana kare.
Ara yara satpathe cale, tini tadera jan'ya patha pradarsana kara bariye dena, ara tadera pradana karena tadera dharmanistha.
Tara ki tabe takiye rayeche sudhu gharira jan'ya yate eti tadera upare ese pare atarkitabhabe? Tabe to era laksanagulo ese'i pareche. Sutaram kemana habe tadera byapara yakhana tadera smarana kariye de'oya habe
ata'eba tumi jene rakha ye allah byatita an'ya upasya ne'i, ara tomara bhula-bhrantira jan'ye tumi paritrana khomjo, ara mumina purusa o mumina naridera jan'ye'o. Ara allah janena tomadera gatibidhi ebam tomadera abasthana.
Ara yara imana eneche tara bale -- ''ekati sura kena abatirna haya na?’’ Kinta yakhana ekati sid'dhantamulaka sura abatirna haya ara tate yud'dhera ullekha thake takhana yadera hrdaye byadhi rayeche tadera tumi dekhate pabe tomara dike takacche mrtyura karane murcchita lokera drstira n'yaya. Sutaram dhik tadera jan'ya
anugatya o sadayabakya! Ata'eba yakhana byaparati sanbandhe sid'dhanta ne'oya haye yaya takhana tara yadi allah‌ra prati satyanistha thake tahale seti'i to tadera jan'ya mangalajanaka.
Kinta yadi tomadera sasanabhara de'oya yaya tahale tomadera theke to asa kara yabe ye tomara abasya'i dese phasada srsti karabe ebam tomadera rakta-samparka chinna karabe.
Era'i tara yadera prati allah dhikkara diyechena, phale tini tadera badhira baniyechena ebam tadera drsti andha kare diyechena.
Ki! Tara ki tabe kura'ana sanbandhe bhababe na, na ki hrdayera upare segulora tala deya rayeche
nihsandeha yara tadera pitha phiriye ghure yaya tadera kache satpatha suspasta habara pare'o, sayatana tadera jan'ya halka kare diyeche ebam tadera jan'ya sudirgha kareche.
E'ita'i! Kenana allah ya abatarana karechena tate yara ghrna kare tadera kache tara bale, ''amara tomadera mene calaba kono-kono byapare.’’ Ara allah janena tadera gopaniyata.
Kinta kemana habe yakhana phiris‌tara tadera mukhe o tadera pithe aghata hanate hanate tadera mrtyu ghatabe
e'iti'i! Kenana allah‌ke ya asantasta kare tara tara'i anusarana kare ara tamra santastilabhake tara apachanda kare, sejan'ya tini tadera kriyakalapa byartha kare dena.
Athaba, yadera antare byadhi rayeche tara ki bhabe ye allah kadapi tadera bidbesabhaba prakasa karabena na
ara amara yadi ca'itama tabe amara niscaya'i tomake tadera dekhatama, takhana tumi alabat tadera cinate parate tadera ceharara dbara. Ara tumi to abasya'i tadera cinate parabe tadera kathara dharane. Ara allah janena tomadera kajakarma.
Ara amara niscaya'i tomadera yaca'i karaba yataksana na amara janate pari tomadera madhyera kathora sangramasiladera o adhyabasayidera, ara tomadera khabara amara pariksa karechi.
Nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare o allah‌ra patha theke sariye rakhe ebam rasulera birud'dhacarana kare tadera kache satpatha suspasta habara pare'o, tara kakhano allah‌ra kono ksati karate parabe na. Ara acire'i tini tadera kriyakalapa nisphala kare debena.
Ohe yara imana enecha! Allah‌ke mene calo o rasulera ajna palana karo, ara tomadera kriyakarma biphala karo na.
Nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare o allah‌ra patha theke sariye rakhe, tarapara mara yaya athaca tara abisbasi thake, se- ksetre allah kakhano tadera paritrana karabena na.
Ata'eba tomara dhilemi karo na ebam santira prati ahbana karo, ara tomara'i to uparahata habe, ara allah tomadera sange rayechena, ara tini kakhano tomadera karyabali tomadera jan'ya byahata karabena na.
Nihsandeha e'i duniyara jibana sudhu kheladhula o amoda-pramoda. Ara yadi tomara imana ano o dharmabhiruta abalanbana kara tabe tini tomadera pradana karabena tomadera puraskara, ara tini tomadera theke tomadera dhanasampada ca'ibena na.
Yadi tini tomadera kacha theke ta ca'itena ebam tomadera capa ditena, tahale tomara karpanya karabe, ara tini prakasa kare dicchena tomadera bidbesa.
Dekho, tomara'i to tara yadera ahbana kara hacche yena tomara allah‌ra pathe byaya kara, kinta tomadera madhye rayeche tara yara krpanata karache, bastutah ye karpanya kare se to bakhili karache tara nijera'i birud'dhe. Ara allah dhanabana, ebam tomara abhabagrasta. Ara tomara yadi phire ya'o tabe tini tomadera sthale an'ya lokadera badale anabena, takhana tara tomadera matana habe na.
Amara niscaya tomake bijaya diyechi ekati ujjbala bijaya
e jan'ya ye allah yena tomake mukti dite parena tomara se'i saba aparadha theke ya gata haye geche o ya raye geche, ara yena tomara upare tamra anugraha purnanga karate parena, ara yena tomake paricalita karate parena sahaja-sathika patha diye
ara yena allah tomake sahayya karate parena eka balistha sahayye.
Tini'i se'ijana yini muminadera antare prasanti barsana karechena yena tini tadera bisbasera sange bisbasa bariye dite parena. Ara mahakasamandalira o prthibira bahinisamuha allahara'i, ara allah hacchena sarbajnata, paramajnani
yena tini mumina purusadera o mumina naridera prabesa karate parena jannate yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, tara se- sabe abasthana karabe, ara tini tadera thake tadera dosatruti mocana karabena. Ara eti allah‌ra kache eka mahasaphalya
Ara yena tini sasti dite parena munaphika purusadera o munaphika naridera ebam musarika purusadera o musarika naridera -- yara allah sanbandhe bhranta dharana dharana kare thake. Tadera birud'dhe duskarma ghure asabe, ara allah tadera upare raga karechena ebam tadera dhikkara diyechena, ara tadera jan'ya tini jahannama tairi karechena. Ara kata nikrsta gantabyasthala
ara mahakasamandali o prthibira bahinisamuha allahara. Ara allah hacchena mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
Amara niscaya'i tomake pathiyechi ekajana saksirupe, ara susambadadata o satarkakarirupe
yena tomara allah‌ra prati o tamra rasulera prati imana anate para, ebam tamke sahayya karate o sam'mana karate para, ara yena tomara tamra namajapa karate para bhore o sandhyaya.
Nihsandeha yara tomara kache anugatyera sapatha grahana kare tara niscaya anugatyera sapatha nicche allah‌ra kache, -- allah‌ra hata chila tadera hatera upare. Sutaram ye ke'u bhanga kare se to tabe bhanga karache tara nijera'i birud'dhe. Ara ye ke'u purana kare ye oyada se allah‌ra sange kareche ta, take tabe tini pradana karabena eka birata pratidana.
Bedu'inadera madhyera yara pechane raye giyechila tara sighra'i tomake balabe -- ''amadera dhanasampatti o amadera paribara- parijana amadera masagula kare rekhechila, sejan'ya amadera jan'ya apani ksama prarthana karuna.’’ Tara tadera jiba diye emana saba bale ya tadera antare ne'i. Tumi bala -- ''ke tabe allah‌ra birud'dhe tomadera jan'ya kichu karabara ksamata rakhe yadi tini tomadera apakara karate cana athaba tomadera upakara karate cana? Bastuta tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah purna oyakiphahala.
Na, tomara bhebechile ye rasula o muminagana ara kakhano tadera paribarabargera kache phire asate parabe na, ara e'iti tomadera antare pritikara mane hayechila, ara tomara bhrantadharana dharana karechila, ara tomara to chile eka dhbansamukhi jati.’’
Ara ye ke'u allah‌te o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa kare na amara to abasya'i abisbasidera jan'ya tairi karechi jbalanta aguna.
Ara mahakasamandali o prthibira sarbabhaumatba allah‌ra. Tini yake iccha karena paritrana karena ebam sasti dena yake iccha karena. Ara allah parama ksamasila, aphuranta phaladata.
Tomara yakhana yud'dhalabdha sampadera uddesye yatra kara ta hastagata karara jan'ye takhana pechane-pare-thaka lokera sange sange balabe -- ''amadera anumati da'o yate amara tomadera anugamana karate pari.’’ Tara allah‌ra kalama badalate caya. Tumi balo -- ''tomara kichute'i amadera anugamana karabe na, allah itipurbe'o emanata'i balechilena.’’ Tate tara sange sange balabe -- ''baram tomara amadera irsa karacha.’’ Bastuta tara yatsaman'ya chara bojhe na.
Bedu'inadera yara pechane raye giyechila tadera bala -- ''sighra'i tomadera daka de'oya habe eka prabala parakranta jatira birud'dhe, tomara tadera sange yud'dha karabe yataksana na tara a‌tmasamarpana kare, takhana yadi tomara ajnapalana kara, tahale allah tomadera pradana karabena eka uttama pratidana. Kintu yadi tomara phire ya'o yemana agera dine tomara phire yete, tahale tini tomadera sayesta karabena marmantuda sastite.
Andhera jan'ya kono aparadha ne'i, ara khomrara jan'ye'o kono aparadha ne'i, ara rogira jan'ye'o kono dosa ne'i. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ra o tamra rasulera ajnapalana kare tadera tini prabesa karabena baganasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, kintu ye ke'u phire yaya tini take sayesta karabena marmantuda sastite.
Allah to muminadera prati santasta haye'i chilena yakhana tara gachatalate tomara anugatyera sapatha grahana karala, ara tadera antare ya chila ta tini janatena, sejan'ya tadera upare tini prasanti barsana karalena, ara tini tadera puraskara diyechilena eka asanna bijaya
ara pracura yud'dhelabdha sampada, tara ta hastagata karabe. Ara allah hacchena mahasaktisali, paramajnani.

ara an'yan'ya ye gulora upare tomara ekhana'o kabaja karate para ni, allah eguloke ghire rekhechena. Ara allah saba- kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara yadi'o ba tomadera sange yud'dha kare tabe niscaya tara pitha pherabe, tarapare tara pabe na kono bandhubandhaba, ara na kono sahayyakari.
Allah‌ra niyama-niti ya itipurbe gata haye geche, ara allah‌ra niyama-nitite tomara kakhano kono paribartana pabe na.
Ara tini'i se'ijana yini makka upatyakaya tadera hatagulo tomadera theke ara tomadera hatagulo tadera theke thekiye rekhechilena, tadera upare tini tomadera bijaya dana karara pare. Ara tomara ya karacha allah se-sabera samyaka drasta.
Era'i tara yara abisbasa posana karechila ebam tomadera badha diyechila pabitra masajida theke, ara utsargikrta pasudera badha diyechila tadera gantabyasthale paumchate. Ara mumina purusa o mumina narira yadi na thakato tahale tadera tomara na-jene tadera dalita karate, phale tadera karane ajanitabhabe eka nindaniya aparadha tomadera pakarato, e-jan'ya ye allah yena yake iccha karena tamra karunara madhye dakhila karate parena. Tara yadi alada haye thakata tahale tadera madhyera yara abisbasa posana kare tadera amara niscaya sasti ditama marmantuda sastite.
Yara abisbasa posana kare tara yakhana tadera antare gom dharechila -- ajnatara yugera gomyartumi -- takhana allah tamra prasanti barsana karechilena tamra rasulera upare o muminadera upare, ara dharmanisthara nitite tadera supratisthita rakhalena, bastuta tara era jan'ya nayya dabidara chila o era upayukta chila, ara allah sarbabisaye sarbajnata.
Allah alabat tamra rasulera jan'ya daibadarsanati yathayathabhabe bastabayita karechena. Tomara suniscita pabitra masajide ina-sa allah prabesa karabe nirapattara sathe, tomadera mastaka mundana ka’re o cula kete, tomara bhaya na ka’re. Kintu tini janena ya tomara jana na, sejan'ya e'iti chara'o tini sanghatita karechena eka asanna bijaya.
Tini'i se'ijana yini tamra rasulake pathiyechena pathanirdesa o satya dharmera sathe yena tini eke pradhan'ya dite parena dharmera -- tadera sabaka’tira upare. Ara saksirupe allah‌i yathesta.
Muham'mada allah‌ra rasula, ara yara tamra sange rayechena tara abisbasidera prati kathora, nijedera madhye komalabhabapanna, tumi tadera dekhate pabe tara allah‌ra kacha theke karunabhandara o santasti kamana ka’re ruku karache sijada karache. Tadera paricayaka hacche tadera mukhamandalera upare sijadara chapera madhye. Emanata'i tadera udaharana ta'orate ebam tadera udaharana injile'o, -- bapana kara sasyabijera mato ya tara ankura udagata kare, tarapara take sakta kare, tarapara ta pusta haya, tarapara ta khara haya tara kandera upare, -- bapanakaridera anandabardhana kare, tini yena tadera karane abisbasidera antarjala srsti karena. Ara jene rekho ye tomadera madhye allah‌ra rasula rayechena. allah‌ra tarapha theke badan'yata o anugraha! Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.

Bastuta tara satya pratyakhyana karechila yakhana tadera kache ta esechila, sejan'ya tara sansayakula abasthaya rayeche.

ara prthibi -- take amara prasarita karechi ara tate sthapana karechi pahara-parbata, ara tate amara janmiyechi hareka rakamera manorama bastu
dekhara mato o manonibesa karara mato bisaya pratyeka anuragi bandara jan'ya.
Ara amara akasa theke barsana kari asirbadasucaka jala, tarapara tara dbara amara janma'i baganasamuha o khadyasasya ya tola haya
ara lanba lanba khejura gacha yate ache gocha gocha kamdi
dasadera jan'ya jibikasbarupa, ara era dbara amara mrta bhukhande prana sancara kari. E'ibhabe'i habe punarut'thana.
Edera age nuha-era sbajati pratyakhyana karechila, ara ras‌-era adhibasira o chamuda jati
Ara'ada o phira'a'una o luta-era bha'i-bandhura
ara a'ikara adhibasira o tubbara lokadala; -- saba'i rasulaganake pratyakhyana karechila, sutaram amara oyada satya bartechila.
Amara ki tabe klanta haye parechi prathamabarera srsti kare'i? Na, tara natuna srsti sanbandhe sandehera majhe rayeche.
Ara amara to niscaya manusa srsti karechi, ara amara jani tara antara take ki mantrana deya, ara amara kanthasirara ceye'o tara aro nikate rayechi.
Smarana rekho, du'ijana grahanakari grahana kare calechena da'ine o bamye base.
Se kono katha'i uccarana kare na yara jan'ya tara nikate'i eka tatpara prakhara prahari ne'i.
Ara mrtyukalina murcha satyi-satyi asabe, -- ''e'iti'i to ta'i ya theke tumi abyahati ca'o.’’
Ara singaya phutkara de'oya habe, ''e'iti'i se'i prati‌sruta dina.’’
Takhana pratyeka sattba cale asabe, tara sange thakabe eka calaka o eka saksi.
Tumi to abasya e sanbandhe gaphilatite chile, kinta ekhana amara tomara theke tomara abarani sariye diyechi phale tomara drsti aja tiksna hayeche.
Ara tara sangi balabe -- ''e'i to ya amara kache tairi rayeche.’’
Tomara dujane jahanname phele da'o pratyeka abisbasike, bidrohacarike
bhalo kaje nisedhakarike, simalanghanakarike, sandehakarike
ye allah‌ra sange an'ya upasya damra kariyechila, ata'eba tomara ubhaye take niksepa karo bhisana sastite.’’
Ara tara sangata balabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Ami to take bidrohi bana'i ni, kinta se nije'i chila sudura bibhrantite.’’
Tini balabena -- ''amara samane tomara tarkatarki karo na, ara ami to tomadera kache itipurbe'i amara oyada agabariyechi.
Amara kache kathara radabadala haya na, ebam ami amara bandadera prati adau an'yayacari na'i.’’
Se'idina amara jahannamake balaba -- ''tumi ki purna haye giyecha?’’ Ara se balabe -- ''aro besi ache ki?’’
Ara behesatake ana habe dharmabhirudera nikate -- adure.
E'iti'i ta yara prati‌sruti tomadera de'oya hayechila pratyeka jana barabara pratyabartanakari hephajatakarira jan'ya
ye parama karunamayake bhaya karata sangopane, ara upasthita hata binaya-namra hrdaya niye.
Ete prabesa karo prasantira sathe. E'i to cirasthayi dina.’’
Edera jan'ya thakabe tara sekhane ya ca'ibe ta'i, tara amadera kache rayeche aro besi.
Ara tadera age amara kata manabagosthike dhbansa karechi, tara edera ca'ite chila saktite besi prabala, phale tara dese- bidese abhiyana calata. Kono asrayasthala ache ki
nihsandeha ete niscaya'i upadesa rayeche tara jan'ya yara hrdaya ache, athaba ye kana deya, ara se saksya bahana kabe.
Ara amara abasya mahakasamandali o prthibi ebam e du'iyera madhye ya-kichu ache ta srsti karechi chaya dine, ara kono klanti amadera sparsa kare ni.
Ata'eba ora ya bale ta sattbe'o tumi adhyabasaya caliye ya'o ebam tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo surya udayera age o asta yabara age
ara ratera belate'o tamra japatapa karo, ara e'i sijadagulora pare'o
ara sono se'idina yakhana ekajana ghosanakari ahbana karabena nikatabarti sthana theke
se'idina tara satyi-satyi mahagarjana sunate pabe. E'iti'i beriye asara dina.
Nihsandeha amara sbayam jibana dana kari ebam amara'i mrtyu ghata'i, ara amadera kache'i sesa-agamana
se'idina prthibi bidirna haye yabe tadera theke strasta-byastabhabe, e'i hacche mahasamabesa -- amadera jan'ya sahaja byapara.
Ora ya bale amara ta bhala jani, ara tumi tadera upare jabaradasti karara loka na'o. Ata'eba tumi kura'ana niye smarana kariye calo tara prati ye amara prati‌srutike bhaya kare.
Bhabo -- biksepakaridera biksepera katha
tarapara bahanakaridera bojhara katha
tarapara calamanadera sbacchandagamanera katha
tarapara bitaranakaridera kajakarmera katha
nihsandeha tomadera prati ya oyada kara hayechila ta abasya'i satya
ara nihsandeha n'yayabicara abasyambhabi.
Bhabo akasera katha -- ajasra patha bisista
tomara to niscaya'i paraspara birodhi kathaya rayecha
ye mukha phiriye thake take e theke phiriye'i rakha haya.
Kotala hoka mithyaracanakarira
yara khoda gahabare, bekheyala
tara jijnasa kare -- ''kabe asabe bicarera dina?’’
Se'i dinatate agune tadera pariksa kara habe.
Tomadera atyacara tomara asbadana kara. E'iti'i se'i yeti tomara tbaranbita karate ceyechila.’’
Nihsandeha dharmabhirura thakabe sbargo'udyanasamuhe o jharana-rajite
tadera prabhu ya tadera debena tara ta grahana karate thakabe. Tara era age niscaya'i chila satkarmasila.
Tara ratera saman'ya samaya'i ghumiye katata.
Ara nisibhore tara paritrana khumjata.
Ara tadera dhanasampadera madhye bhikharira jan'ya o bancitera jan'ya hak rekheche.
Ara prthibite nidarsanabali rayeche niscita-bisbasidera jan'ya
ara tomadera nijedera madhye. Tabu'o ki tomara ceye dekhabe na
ara akase rayeche tomadera jibika, ara ya tomadera oyada kara hayeche.
Ata'eba mahakasa o prthibira prabhura sapatha -- nihsandeha e alabat satya, yemanata tomara bastuta bakyalapa kara.
Tomara kache ibrahimera sam'manita atithidera sambada eseche ki
tara yakhana tamra darabare prabesa karala tara takhana balale -- ''salama’’. Tini'o balalena -- ''salama’’, aparicita loka.
Tini takhana tamra paribarera kache nirabe chutalena ebam ekati pusta bachura niye elena
tarapara tini eti tadera samane egiye dilena, tini balalena -- ''apanara ki khabena na?’’
Sutaram tadera samparke tini bhaya anubhaba karalena. Tara balale -- ''bhaya karo na.’’ Paksantare tara tamke susambada dila eka jnanabana chelera.
Tarapara tamra stri egiye elena bilapa karate-karate, ara tini tamra gale capara marachena ebam balachena, ''eka buri, bandhya!’’
Tara balale -- ''emanata'i habe, tomara prabhu balechena.’’ Nihsandeha tini sbayam paramajnani, sarbajnata.
Tini balalena -- ''tahale tomadera bisesa barta ki, he bartabahakagana?’’
Tara balale -- ''amadera abasya prerana kara hayeche eka aparadhi lokadera prati
yena tadera upare amara barsana karate pari matira pathara
ya amitacaridera jan'ya nirdharita rayeche tomara prabhura kache.’’
Tarapara muminadera madhyera yara sekhane rayechila tadera amara bera kare analama
kinta amara sekhane musalimadera ekati paribara byatita ara ka'uke pa'ini.
Ara amara sekhane rekhe diyechilama eka nidarsana tadera jan'ya yara marmantuda sastike bhaya kare.
Ara musara madhye'o. Dekho! Amara tamke pathiyechilama phira'a'unera kache suspasta kartrtba diye.
Kinta se phire giyechila tara saktimattara dike ebam balechila -- ''ekajana jadukara athaba ekajana pagala.’’
Takhana amara take o tara dalabalake pakara'o karalama ebam tadera niksepa karalama athai jale, ara se chila dosi.
Ara'ada jatira ksetre'o. Dekho! Amara tadera birud'dhe pathiyechilama eka bidhbansi jhara.
E yara upare ese parechila tara kono kichu'i rekhe yaya ni, etike ta kare diyechila cha'iyera mato.
Ara chamuda-jatira ksetre'o. Dekho! Tadera bala hayechila -- ''kichukala upabhoga kare na'o.’’
Tathapi tadera prabhura adesera birud'dhe tara damriyechila, phale eka bajranada tadera pakaralo, ara tara takiye rayechila.
Tadera ara damrabara ksamata ra'ila na, ara tara sahayyaprapta hate'o pare ni.
Ara purbakalina nuhera lokadalake'o. Nihsandeha tara chila satyatyagi jati.
Ara mahakasamandala -- amara ta nirmana karechi hate, ara amara'i bisalatara nirmata.
Ara prthibi -- amara eke bichiye diyechi, kaje'i kata sundara e'i bistarakari
ara pratyeka bastura madhye amara jora-jora srsti karechi, yena tomara manonibesa karo.
Ata'eba tomara bege allah‌ra dike chuto. Ami niscaya'i tomadera nikata tamra kacha theke ekajana suspasta satarkakari.
Ara allah‌ra sathe an'ya kono upasya damra karo na. Nihsandeha ami tomadera nikata tamra kacha theke eka jana suspasta satarkakari.’’
E'ibhabe'i. Edera age yara chila tadera kache emana kono rasula asena ni yamke tara na balechila -- ''ekajana jadukara, na haya ekajana pagala.’’
Era ki etike'i maurusi bisaya baniyeche? Na, tara hacche simalanghanakari jati.
Ata'eba tadera theke tumi mukha phiriye na'o, kenana tumi to dosi na'o.
Tabu'o tumi upadesa dite thako, kenana nihsandeha upadesadana muminadera upakara karabe.
Ara ami jina o manusake, tara amake upasana karuka -- e'ijan'ya chara srsti kari ni.
Ami tadera theke kono jibika ca'i na, ara ami ca'i na ye tara amake kha'oyabe.
Baranca allaha -- tini'i birata riyekadata, ksamatara adhikari, saktimana.
Sutaram yara an'yayacarana kareche tadera jan'ya abasya'i rayeche eka jhuri tadera sangopangadera jhurira n'yaya, sejan'ya tara yena amara kache tarighari na kare.
Ata'eba dhik tadera jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare -- tadera se'i dinatira karane yeti tadera oyada kara hayeche
bhabo paharera katha
ara likhita granthera
eka kholamela pataya
ara bhabo ghanaghana gamanagamanera grhera katha
ara samunnata chadera
ara ucchalita samudrera katha
nihsandeha tomara prabhura sasti abasyabi
etira jan'ya kono pratirodhakari ne'i
Yedina akasa alorana karabe alorane
ara paharagulo cale yabe cale ya'oyaya.
Ata'eba dhik se'idina pratyakhyanakaridera jan'ya
yara brtha tarkabitarke khela khelache.
Se'idina tadera dhakka diye ne'oya habe jahannamera agunera dike dhakka dite dite.
E'iti'i se'i aguna yetike tomara mithya balate.
Eti ki tabe jadu? Na ki tomara dekhate paccha na
dhuke para ete! Atahpara tomara dhairya dhara athaba dhairya na-dhara, tomadera jan'ya ekasamana. Tomadera pratiphala de'oya hacche sudhumatra tomara ya karate tara'i.’’
Nihsandeha muttakira thakabe jannate o paramanande
tadera prabhu ya tadera diyechena sejan'ya tara sukhabhoga karate thakabe, ara tadera prabhu tadera raksa karabena bhayankara agunera sasti theke.
Tomara ya kare thakate sejan'ya trptira sathe kha'oda'o o pana karo.’’
Tara helana diye basabe sari-sari sinhasanera upare, ara amara tadera jora miliye deba ayatalocana huradera sathe.
Ara yara imana ane, ebam yadera santanasantati dharmabisbase tadera anusarana kare -- amara tadera sange milana ghataba tadera chelemeyedera, ara amara tadera kriyakarma theke kono kichu'i tadera jan'ya kamiye deba na. Pratyeka byakti'i se ya arjana kareche sejan'ya dayi.
Ara amara tadera pracura parimane pradana karaba phalaphasala o machamansa -- ya tara pachanda kare ta theke.
Tara sekhane ekati panapatra parasparera madhye adana-pradana karabe, tate thakabe na kono khelo acarana, na kono papa.
Ara tadera caridike ghurabe tadera kisorara, -- tara yena suraksita mukto
ara tadera ke'u-ke'u aparera dike jijnasabada ka’re egiye yabe
tara balabe -- ''nihsandeha amara itipurbe amadera parijanadera samparke bhita chilama.
Tabe allaha amadera prati anugraha karechena, ara amadera raksa karechena tapapirita bayuprabahera sasti theke.
Amara abasya era age'o tamke dakate thakatama. Nihsandeha tini khoda ati sadasaya, aphuranta phaladata.
Ata'eba tumi upadesa dana karate thako, kenana tomara prabhura anugrahe tumi to ganatkara na'o ebam matha-pagala'o na'o.
Athaba tara ki bale -- ''ekajana kabi, amara baram tara jan'ya apeksa kari kalera kabale parara daruna
tumi balo -- ''tomara apeksa karate thako, ami'o tabe abasya tomadera sange apeksakaridera madhye rayechi.’’
Athaba tadera bodhasakti ki e-bisaye tadera nirdesa diye thake? Athaba tara ki eka simalanghanakari jati
athaba tara ki bale ye eti se barnana kareche? Na, tara bisbasa kare na.
Tahale tara era samatulya eka racana niye asuka, -- yadi tara satyabadi haya.
Athaba tadera ki srsti kara hayeche ke'u na-thaka theke, na tara'i srstikarta
athaba tara ki srsti karechila mahakasamandala o prthibi? Na, tara drrhabisbasa rakhe na.
Athaba tadera kache'i ki rayeche tomara prabhura dhanabhandara, na tara'i niyanta
athaba tadera kache ki rayeche siri yamra sahayye tara sone neya? Tahale tadera srabanakari niye asuka eka suspasta pramana.
Athaba tamra karane ki rayeche kan'yarasaba, ara tomadera jan'ya rayeche putrara
athaba tumi ki tadera kache parisramika ca'icha, yara phale tara denaya bharakranta haye geche
athaba adrsya ki tadera kache rayeche yara phale tara likhe phelate pare
athaba tara ki sarayantra karate caya? Kinta yara abisbasa posana kare tara nijera'i sarayantre jariye parabe.
Athaba allah chara tadera ki an'ya upasya rayeche? Allah‌ra'i saba mahima -- tara ya sarika kare tini tara ba'ire.
Ara yadi tara dekhe akasera eka tukaro bhenge parache, tahale tara balabe -- ''eka punjibhuta meghamala.’’
Ata'eba tadera chere da'o ye paryanta na tara tadera se'i dinatira saksat paya yakhana tara hatabhanba haye yabe
se'idina tadera cala-cakranta tadera kono kaje asabe na, ara tadera sahayya'o kara habe na.
Ara yara an'yayacara kareche tadera jan'ya e chara aro sasti rayeche, kinta tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
Ata'eba tomara prabhura bicarera jan'ya dhairya dhare theko, bastuta tumi niscaya'i amadera cokhera samane rayecha. Kaje'i tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo yakhana tumi uthe damra'o
ara ratera belaya'o tabe tamra japatapa karo ebam taragulo jhimiye yabara samaye'o.
Bhabo tarakara katha, yakhana ta asta yaya
tomadera sangi dosa-truti karena na, ara tini bipathe'o yana na
ara tini icchamata kono katha balena na.
E'ikhana pratyadista ha'oya pratyadesabani bai to naya
tamke sikhiyechena birata saktimana
balabiryera adhikari. Kaje'i tini paripurnataya paumchalena.
Ara tini rayechena urdhba digante.
Tarapara tini sannikate elena, atahpara tini abanata karalena
takhana tini du'i dhanukera byabadhane ra'ilena, athaba ara'o kache.
Takhana tini tamra bandara kache pratyadesa karalena ya tini pratyadesa karena.
Hrdaya asbikara kare ni ya tini dekhechilena tate.
Tomara ki tabe tamra sange bitarka karabe ya tini dekhechena se-sanbandhe
ara tini niscaya'i tamke dekhechilena an'ya eka abatarane
duradigantera sidarah‌-gachera kache
tara kache ache cira-upabhogya udyana.
Dekho! Ya acchadana kare ta dheke diyechila sidarah‌-gachake
drsti bibhranta haya ni ebam ta sima chariye'o yaya ni.
Tini niscaya'i tamra prabhura srestha nidarsanagulora madhye ceye dekhechilena.
Tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha lata o'uyaya
ebam manata, -- trtiya arekati
tomadera jan'ya putrasantana ara tamra jan'ya kan'ya
e to bara'i asangata bantana
Tara namabali bai to naya, ya tomara namakarana karecha -- tomara o tomadera purbapurusara, yadera jan'ya allah kono sanada pathana ni. Tara to sudhu anumanera ebam ya tadera antara kamana kare tara'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera prabhura kacha theke tadera kache pathanirdesa abasya'i ese geche.
Athaba manusera jan'ya ki ta'i thakabe ya se kamana kare
kinta sesata to allah‌ra, ara prathamata'o.
Ara mahakasamandale kata ye phiris‌ta rayeche yadera suparisa kono kaje asabe na yataksana na allah anumati dena tara jan'ya yake tini iccha karena o tini santasta hayechena.
Nihsandeha yara parakale bisbasa kare na tara phiris‌tadera nama deya meyedera name.
Ara e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i. Tara to anumanera'i anusarana karache, ara nihsandeha satyera birud'dhe anumane kono labha haya na.
Sejan'ya take upeksa karo ye amadera upadesa theke phire yaya ara duniyara jibana chara ara kichu caya na.
E'iti'i tadera jnanera sesasima. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini'i bhala janena take ye tara patha theke bhrasta hayeche, ara tini'i bhala janena ye satpathaprapta.
Ara mahakasamandale ya-kichu ache ebam ya-kichu ache prthibite ta allah‌ra'i, yena yara manda kaja kareche tadera tini pratiphala dite parena ya tara kareche sejan'ya, ara yara satkaja kareche tadera tini bhalabhabe pratidana dite parena.
Yara barjana kare bara bara papacara o aslila kaja -- mukhomukhi ha'oya bhinna -- tomara prabhu paritrane niscaya'i aparisima. Tini tomadera bhalo janena yakhana theke tini tomadera srstira sucana karechena mati theke, ara yakhana tomara chile tomadera mayera pete bhranarupe. Ata'eba tomara tomadera nijedera gunagana karo na. Tini'i bhalo janena take ye dharmabhiruta abalanbana kare.
Tumi ki tabe take dekhecha ye phire yaya
Ara yatsaman'ya dana kare ebam nirdayata dekhaya
tara kache ki adrsya samparke jnana rayeche phale se dekhata pacche
athaba take ki sambada de'oya haya ni musara granthe ya ache se-sanbandhe
ebam ibrahima sanbandhe yini sampurnarupe pratipalana karechilena
yatha kono bharabahi an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
ara e'i ye manusera jan'ya kichu'i thakabe na yara jan'ya se cesta na ka’re
ara e'i ye, tara pracesta acire'i drstigocara habe
tarapara take pratidana de'oya habe paripurna pratidane
ara e'i ye, tomara prabhura dike'i hacche sesa-sima
ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ara tini'i kamdana
ara e'i ye, tini'i marena o tini'i bamcana.
Ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karechena joraya-joraya nara o nari
sukrakita theke yakhana take bin'yasa kara haya
ara e'i ye, tamra upare'i rayeche punaraya ut'thanera dayitba
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhanadaulata dena o sukha-samrd'dhi pradana karena
ara e'i ye, tini'i si'ra naksatrera prabhu
ara e'i ye, tini'i dhbansa karechilena pracinakalera'ada-jatike
ara chamuda-jati'o, ta'i tini baki rakhena ni
ara nuha-era lokadala'o era age. Nihsandeha tara chila -- tara'i to chila atyanta atyacari o bejaya abadhya.
Ara ulate phela saharagulo -- tini dhbansa karechilena
phale tadera tini dheke diyechilena ya dheke deya.
Ata'eba tomara prabhura kona anugraha samparke tumi badanubada karabe
pracinakalera satarkakaridera madhye theke ini hacchena ekajana satarkakari.
Asanna ghatana samagata
eti dura karabara mato allah chara ara ke'u ne'i.
E'i bibrtite tomara ki tajjaba haccha
ara tomara ki hasacha, tomara ki ara kamdabe na
ara tomara to helaphela karacha.
Ata'eba allah‌ra prati sijada karo ebam upasana karo.
Gharighanta samagata, ara candra dbikhandita hayeche.
Ara yadi tara kono nidarsana dekhe, tara phire yaya o bale -- ''eka jabaradasta jadu.’’
Ara tara pratyakhyana kare ebam tara tadera kheyalakhusira anusarana kare, athaca pratyeka bisayera'i nispatti haye'i geche.
Ara tadera kache abasya kichuta sambada ese'i geche yate rayeche pratisedhaka
eka suparinata jnana, kintu e satarkikarana kono kaje ase na.
Kaje'i tadera theke phire esa. Ekadina ahbanakari ahbana karabena eka apritikara byaparera prati
tadera cokha abanata abasthaya, tara beriye asate thakabe kabara theke yena tara chariye para pangapala
ora ahabayakera prati chute asabe. Abisbasira balabe -- ''e'iti bara kathina dina!’’
Edera age nuha-era lokadala satyapratyakhyana karechila, phale tara amadera bandake pratyakhyana karala o balale -- ''eka ti pagala’’! Ara tamke abajna kara hayechila.
Sejan'ya tini tamra prabhuke deke balalena -- ''ami to parabhuta haye parechi, ata'eba tumi sahayya karo.’’
Takhana amara asamanera darajagulo khule dilama barsanasila panira dbara
ara jaminake utksepa karate dilama jharanadharaya, phale pani milita haye gela eka purbanirdharita byapare
ara amara tamke bahana karalama tate ya chila takta o pereka sanbalita
ta bhese calechila amadera cokhera samane, -- eka pratidana tamra jan'ya yamke pratyakhyana kara hayechila.
Ara amara abasya etike rekhe diyechi eka nidarsanarupe. Kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera antarbhukta
sutaram kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
ara amara to abasya'i kura'anake upadesagrahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki ache ye upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara'ada-jati satyapratyakhyana karechila, kaje'i kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
Nihsandeha amara tadera upare eka carama durbhagyera dine pathiyechilama eka pracanda jhara-tophana
ya manusake uriye niyechila, yena tara chila utpatita khejuragachera gumri.
Sutaram kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
kaje'i amara alabat kura'anake upadesa grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki habe upadesapraptadera antarbhukta
chamuda-jati'o satarkikarana pratyakhyana karechila.
Kaje'i tara balechila -- ''ki! Amadera madhyekara manusa'i ekajana, take'i ki amara anusarana karaba? Seksetre amara to niscaya'i bipathagami haba o pagalamite paraba.
Amadera madhye theke smaraka ki tara upare'i patita hala? Bastuta se ekajana d'aha mithyabadi, dambhika.’’
Kalake'i tara tbaraya janate parabe ke mithyuka, ke dambhika.
Nihsandeha amara ekati ustrike pathate yacchi tadera jan'ya pariksasbarupa, sejan'ya tadera prati laksya rakho ebam dhairyadharana karo.
Ara tadera janiye da'o ye panira ksetre tadera madhye bhagabhagi rayeche, pratyeka jalapane hajira thakabe.
Kintu tara tadera senatke daka dila, takhana se dharala o kete phelala.
Pariname kemana hayechila amara sasti o amara satarkikarana
amara abasya'i tadera upare pathiyechilama ekatimatra mahagarjana, phale tara haye gela khomyara-prastutakarira sukano-bhanga dalapalara n'yaya.
Ara amara niscaya'i kura'anake upadesa-grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diyechi, kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera an'yatama
luta-era lokadala'o satarkikarana pratyakhyana karechila.
Nihsandeha amara tadera upare pathiyechilama eka pathara barsanakari jhara, -- luta-era parijanadera byatita, amara tadera ud'dhara karechilama sesarate
amadera tarapha theke eka anugraha. E'ibhabe'i amara puraskara di'i ye krtajnata dekhaya take.
Ara tini to itipurbe'i tadera satarka kare diyechilena amadera bhisanabhabe pakarano samparke, kintu tara amara satarkikarana sanbandhe katha-katakati karachila.
Ara tara abasya tamra kacha theke tamra atithidera ceyechila, takhana amara tadera cokhaguloke sesa kare diyechilama, ''ata'eba amara sasti asbadana kara amara satarkikaranera pare.’’
Ara abasya nirdharita sasti bhorabelate tadera upare parechila.
Amara sasti ekhana asbadana kara amara satarkikaranera pare?’’
Ara amara to niscaya'i kura'anake upadesa grahanera jan'ya sahajabodhya kare diye'ichi, kintu ke ache ye upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara abasya phira'a'unera lokadera kache satarkikarana esechila.
Tara amadera nidarsanasamuha -- tadera sabaka’ti, pratyakhyana karechila, sejan'ya amara tadera pakara'o karechilama mahasaktisali paramaksamatabanera pakaranora dbara.
Tomadera abisbasira ki edera ca'ite bhala, na tomadera jan'ya abyahati rayeche dharmagranthera madhye
athaba tara ki bale -- ''amara parasparera sahayyakari asta ekata dala’’
sighra'i e lokadala bidhabasta habe ebam prspradarsana kare phire yabe.
Bastuta gharighanta'i tadera nirdharita sthanakala, ara se'i gharighanta habe ati kathora o bara tikta.
Nihsandeha aparadhira bibhranta o bikaragrasta habe.
Se'i dina tadera mukha hecamre tadera tene niye ya'oya habe agunera madhye -- ''jbalamaya agunera sparsa asbadana karo!’’
Nihsandeha pratyekati jinisa -- amara eti srsti karechi parimapa anusare.
Ara amadera adesa ekabara bai to naya, cokhera palakera n'yaya.
Ara amara to tomadera senatdera dhbansa kare diyechilama, kintu ke'u ki rayeche upadesapraptadera madhyekara
ara tara ya kareche tara saba-kichu'i nathipatre rayeche.
Ara chota o bara pratyekati bisaya lipibad'dha ache.

ara-rahamana
tini kura'ana siksa diyechena.

Surya o candra hiseba mato caleche.
Ara trnalata o gachapala anugatya karache.
Ara akasake, -- tini take samucca karechena, ara tini sthapana karechena damripalla.
Yena tomara mapakathite ullanghana na karo.

tabe baki thakabe tomara prabhura cehara -- parama mahima o mahanubhabatara adhikari.

Mahakasamandale o prthibite yara rayeche tara tamra'i kache prarthana janaya. Prati niyata tini maryadaya birajamana.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe

Ata'eba tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tomadera ubhayera jan'ya pathano habe agunera sikha o tamara sphulinga, takhana tomara sahayya pete parabe na.
Ta'i tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe

Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
aparadhidera cena yabe tadera ceharara dbara, kaje'i tadera pakarano habe culera jhumtite o thengaguloya.

ara ye tara prabhura samane damrabara bhaya rakhe tara jan'ya rayeche duti sbargo'udyana

e dutoya rayeche pratyeka phalamulera jora jora.

Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tadera madhye rayeche salaja-namra ayatalocana, -- edera age kono manusa tadera sparsa kare ni, ara jina'o naya.
Sutaram tomadera prabhura kon anugraha tomara ubhaye asbikara karabe
tara yena cuni o prabala.

duto'i garha-sabuja.

huragana, -- tambura bhetare antahpurabasini.
